T02TD1511E:308b-1: shr'i samba ra mandala bi dhi:/
T02TD1511E:308b-3: dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1511E:308b-4: nam mkha' las rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i //
T02TD1511E:308b-5: 'khor lo sdom pa la btud nas //
T02TD1511E:308b-6: de yi dkyil 'khor sogs cho ga ;
T02TD1511E:308b-7: ; bla ma las rnyed bri bar bya //
T02TD1511E:308b-9: slob dpon g-yon na kha tv'am ga / h'um sgrogs g-yas na da ma ru //
T02TD1511E:308b-10: yang dag ye shes rgyud shes shing //
T02TD1511E:308b-11: he ru ka dpal gsang sngags zhes //
T02TD1511E:308b-12: khro med gtsang sbra brtson 'grus ldan //
T02TD1511E:308b-13: sbyor shes ye shes pha rol son //
T02TD1511E:308b-14: mgo skyes la ni thod pas brgyan //
T02TD1511E:308b-15: thal ba yis ni lus la byugs //
T02TD1511E:308b-17: gsang ba rab tu bstan pa las kyang /
T02TD1511E:308b-18: bla ma rnam pa gnyis rab bshad //
T02TD1511E:308b-20: rgyu yi tshul gyis mdor ston cing //
T02TD1511E:308b-22: mdor bstan lus ngag ngo bo ste ;
T02TD1511E:308b-23: / rgyas par 'chad pa sems nyid do //
T02TD1511E:308b-24: dkyil 'khor slob dpon tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1511E:308b-25: phyi rol dang ni nang du gnas //
T02TD1511E:308b-26: 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi //
T02TD1511E:308b-27: bla ma bla med rnams pa gnyis //
T02TD1511E:308b-28: longs spyod grol ba'i 'bras ster ba //
T02TD1511E:308b-29: rab tu 'bad de mchod par bya //
T02TD1511E:308b-30: zhes gsungs pa ni slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1511E:308b-33: zangs la sogs pa las byas pa'i zhabs bsil dang bsang gtor dang /
T02TD1511E:308b-35: mchod yon gyi snod rnams su nas dang 'o ma dang /
T02TD1511E:309a-1: la sogs pa blugs te yi ge gsum dang rang gi bdag po dang las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis brgya tsa brgyad dang lan bdun du bsngags la /
T02TD1511E:309a-2: snod de gsum rang gi g-yon du man ji'i steng du ba zhag cing /
T02TD1511E:309a-3: de'i mdun du yang bzed zhal gsum man ji'i steng du'o//
T02TD1511E:309a-4: de la zhabs bsil gyi snod kyi chu g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe bo dang mdzub mo'i skam pas me tog bzung la rol pas sor mo rnams bskor zhing mdzub mo la sogs pa'i sor mo rnams rim gyis brkyang ste /
T02TD1511E:309a-5: aom a'a: hr'i pra ba ra sa ta k'a ram p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:309a-6: zhes pa gsum gyis bzed zhal dbul lo //
T02TD1511E:309a-7: mchod pa bya ba'i zhabs gnyis la bsams nas so //
T02TD1511E:309a-8: snod gnyis pa'i chu g-yas na gnas pa'i ku sha'i chun po'i rtse mos blangs nas bzed zhal gzhan du mchod bya'i sku la bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD1511E:309a-9: de nyid kyi chu g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i skam pas me tog bzung la de'i bzed zhal du kha thur du bstan pa'i khu tshul gyis zhabs bsil pa'i ched du mchod bya'i phyag tu mthe chung la sogs pa rim gyis brkyang zhing lan gsum du dbul lo //
T02TD1511E:309a-10: snod gsum pa'i chu la sogs pa snyim pas bzung ste rdo rje thal mo phye pas bzed zhal gyi snod gsum par mchod yon lan gsum mo //
T02TD1511E:309a-11: de thams cad sngags de nyid kyis te 'on kyang p'a dyam gi gnas su proksha nam dang /
T02TD1511E:309a-19: dri ni mchad bya'i thugs kar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:309a-20: 'di ni cho ga thams cad du mchod yon la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1511E:309a-21: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam shes pas //
T02TD1511E:309a-22: sngon du bsnyen pa tshogs sogs cing //
T02TD1511E:309a-23: bgegs ni rnam par nyams byed bya //
T02TD1511E:309a-24: dngos grub bsnyen pa med na min //
T02TD1511E:309a-25: de phyir rim gnyis de nyid rig /
T02TD1511E:309a-26: dben bar yang dag gnas nas ni //
T02TD1511E:309a-27: bde mchog 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1511E:309a-28: skyo na de yi gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD1511E:309a-30: yang na rang gi lha yi 'bum //
T02TD1511E:309a-31: dkyil 'khor pa yi khri yin te /
T02TD1511E:309a-32: 'di ni sngon du bsnyen par brjod //
T02TD1511E:309b-0: rim pa gnyis @309b kyi rnal 'byor ni //
T02TD1511E:309b-1: l'u yi pa'i mngon par rtogs pa la sogs bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:309b-3: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bya ba ni rgyal dang /
T02TD1511E:309b-6: bya dbo'i zla ba ma gtogs pa'i zla ba rnams dang /
T02TD1511E:309b-17: ba ba sangs rgyas rnams su'o //
T02TD1511E:309b-20: lag la skal ba bzang po'o //
T02TD1511E:309b-23: me bzhi la dngos grub po //
T02TD1511E:309b-26: snubs dang gro bzhin la lung la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1511E:309b-27: chu stod chu slad la bu 'phel lo //
T02TD1511E:309b-28: khrums stod khrums smad dag la bu mo 'phel lo //
T02TD1511E:309b-29: zhi ba'i gza' la brten pa'i dus sbyor dang rnams par sel ba dang //
T02TD1511E:309b-37: sha kho na 'dzin pa ma gtogs pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1511E:309b-38: 'jug phod dang bral ba'i byed pa rnams la ste /
T02TD1511E:309b-41: dbyar dus rab gnas grub pa'o //
T02TD1511E:309b-42: ston ni bde ba ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:309b-43: dgun stod ye shes 'phel ba ster //
T02TD1511E:309b-44: dgun smad dbang phyug thams cad 'byung //
T02TD1511E:309b-45: dpyid ka dpal ni rab tu sbyin //
T02TD1511E:309b-46: so sa kar rgyal dang zhi ba ster //
T02TD1511E:309b-47: rab gnas dus ni thams cad du //
T02TD1511E:309b-48: sangs rgyas bzhugs su 'jug par bzhed //
T02TD1511E:309b-50: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las kyang /
T02TD1511E:309b-51: gtsug tor rtag tu sbyin par bya //
T02TD1511E:309b-52: rtag tu sbyin sreg byed du gzhug / rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD1511E:309b-53: rtag tu sangs rgyas rab gnas bya //
T02TD1511E:309b-54: zin pa'i de ma thag pa ru //
T02TD1511E:309b-55: rab tu gnas pa mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:309b-56: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yi //
T02TD1511E:309b-57: dbang phyug thob par the tshom med //
T02TD1511E:309b-58: de la gza' dang rgyu skar med //
T02TD1511E:309b-59: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med //
T02TD1511E:309b-60: cung zad yid la gang 'dod pa //
T02TD1511E:309b-62: zhes pa ni dus kyi nges pa'o //
T02TD1511E:310a-0: de nas slob dpon khrus byas te lha @310a * //
T02TD1511E:310a-1: mchod pa dang gtor ma byas la gos gtsang ma rgyan legs par bgos pa'i bdag nyid kyis phyi dro'i dus su sa dang lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la /
T02TD1511E:310a-2: pus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD1511E:310a-3: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams las sa bslang bar bya ste /
T02TD1511E:310a-4: khams 'di na ni mgon gang dag / chen pos mchod pa bzhugs rnams dang //
T02TD1511E:310a-5: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
T02TD1511E:310a-6: dri za dang lha min sogs //
T02TD1511E:310a-7: sems can kun don bsgrub bya'i phyir //
T02TD1511E:310a-8: de dang de la gsol bar bgyi //
T02TD1511E:310a-9: gal te khyed kyis gnang ba na //
T02TD1511E:310a-10: bgyi ste gzhan du ma yin no //
T02TD1511E:310a-11: rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yis //
T02TD1511E:310a-12: sa bzang 'di ni bdag la gsol //
T02TD1511E:310a-13: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:310a-14: de'i rjes su 'jig rten dbang byug gi mdun du mchod pa byas la //
T02TD1511E:310a-15: aom mu tsi li sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:310a-16: aom mo ha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:310a-17: aom da ta li sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:310a-18: zhes bya ba'i rmi lam brtag pa 'dis lag pa g-yon pa sa kha la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags la mgo lhor bstan zhing shar du kha bltas la gtsang sbras nyal lo //
T02TD1511E:310a-19: rmi lam ngan na las thams cad pa bzlas pa dang /
T02TD1511E:310a-20: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bgegs bzlog nas lhas gnang ba'am ma bkag pa'i sa la cho ga bya ste /
T02TD1511E:310a-21: 'on kyang srid na grong rdal dang /
T02TD1511E:310a-24: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i dbang ldan kho nar dang /
T02TD1511E:310a-25: med na gang du yi rang bar ro //
T02TD1511E:310a-26: lha khang mchod rten khang bzangs khang brtsegs dang//
T02TD1511E:310a-27: rab gnas dkyil 'khor la sogs byed 'dod pas //
T02TD1511E:310a-28: 'dir ni sa yi lto 'phye brtag bya ste //
T02TD1511E:310a-29: sa gzhi gang yin de ni gru bzhir bya //
T02TD1511E:310a-30: zla ba gsum gyi nyin mo'i grangs kyis 'dir //
T02TD1511E:310a-31: phyogs ni so sor sa de rnam par dbye //
T02TD1511E:310a-32: dbang ldan nas ni me yi mtshams kyi bar //
T02TD1511E:310a-33: shar gyi sa de dgu bcur rnam par dbye //
T02TD1511E:310a-34: me nas bden bral mtshams kyi bar dang ni //
T02TD1511E:310a-35: bden bral nas ni rlung gi mtshams bar dang //
T02TD1511E:310a-36: rlung nas 'byung po'i bdag po'i mtshams kyi bar //
T02TD1511E:310a-37: de bzhin kho nar dgu bcur rnam dbye bya //
T02TD1511E:310a-38: ston zlar ba 'bring dang tha ma'i bar //
T02TD1511E:310b-0: dbang ldan @310b mtshams la sogs par mgo bo gnas //
T02TD1511E:310b-1: bden bral mtshams la sogs par mjug ma'i cha //
T02TD1511E:310b-2: gsang ba'i gnas ni sa yi dbus su gzhag / lte ba'i 'og gi cha ni lto 'phye'i lus //
T02TD1511E:310b-3: steng cha gdengs ka dang ldan mi yi gzugs //
T02TD1511E:310b-4: lhor blta lag pa g-yon pa rna bar gzhag / g-yas pa rin chen thogs pas dkur bkab nas //
T02TD1511E:310b-5: sa yi cha dgu khyab par nyal nas gnas //
T02TD1511E:310b-6: klu yi rgyal po lus tshad mtho bcu'o //
T02TD1511E:310b-7: shar dang nub kyi mtha' mar gnas na yang //
T02TD1511E:310b-8: sa yi dum bu de ni 'jal ba ltar //
T02TD1511E:310b-9: nyi ma'i bgrod pas tshes gcig la sogs par //
T02TD1511E:310b-10: nyin zhag re re zhing ni cha re rer ;
T02TD1511E:310b-11: / ji ltar rigs pas shar gyi cha ru rgyu //
T02TD1511E:310b-12: lho dang nub dang byang du'ang de bzhin no //
T02TD1511E:310b-13: dgun zla ra ba 'bring dang tha ma yi //
T02TD1511E:310b-14: dkar phyogs la sogs nub tu kha mig blta //
T02TD1511E:310b-15: me yi mtshams su yan lag mchog bstan te //
T02TD1511E:310b-16: rlung gi mtshams la sogs par mjug ma gnas //
T02TD1511E:310b-17: dpyid zlar ba 'bring dang tha ma de'i //
T02TD1511E:310b-18: gnod sbyin bdag phyogs kha dang mig gis blta //
T02TD1511E:310b-19: bden bral mtshams la sogs par mgo bo gnas //
T02TD1511E:310b-20: dbang ldan mtshams la sogs par mug ma'i cha //
T02TD1511E:310b-21: dbyar zla ra 'bring dang tha ma ru //
T02TD1511E:310b-22: shar phyogs su ni kha dang mig gis blta //
T02TD1511E:310b-23: rlung gi mtshams la sogs bar mgo bo gnas //
T02TD1511E:310b-24: me yi mtshams la sogs par mjug ma'i cha //
T02TD1511E:310b-25: lo gcig na ni sa gzhi mtha' dag tu //
T02TD1511E:310b-26: 'khor gcig gis ni 'bad pas kun du khyab //
T02TD1511E:310b-27: lto 'phyi'i rgyal po'i rgyu ba'i dbye ba ni //
T02TD1511E:310b-28: zla ba re re'i bye brag shes nas su //
T02TD1511E:310b-29: mtha' yas bdag nyid dkar po mdzes pa'i sku //
T02TD1511E:310b-30: mjug ma la sogs rim gyis bsams nas su //
T02TD1511E:310b-31: de yi lus la klu yi bdag po brgyad //
T02TD1511E:310b-32: 'o ma la sogs nye bar spyod mas mchod //
T02TD1511E:310b-33: mjug ma'i rtse mor rigs ldan shin tu sngo //
T02TD1511E:310b-34: gsang gnas d'ur ba ltar ljang stobs kyi rgyu //
T02TD1511E:310b-35: lte bar dung skyong padma'i rtsa ba bzhin //
T02TD1511E:310b-36: dpung bar padma chen po gser dang mtshungs //
T02TD1511E:310b-37: nor rgyas snying gar gnas pa ljang gu ste //
T02TD1511E:310b-38: 'jog po zhes bya dmar po mgrin par gnas //
T02TD1511E:310b-39: rna bar padma dkar po 'od zer can //
T02TD1511E:310b-40: spyi bo ru ni mtha' yas sngon po gnas //
T02TD1511E:311a-1: bgegs mthar byed kyi rnam bar bsgom //
T02TD1511E:311a-2: dba' bo'i lag pa tog rtse rdo rjes mtshan //
T02TD1511E:311a-3: lag pa g-yon pa 'og tu byas nas bzung //
T02TD1511E:311a-4: de yis bdud kyi tshogs ni skrag cing bzlog / shar dang byang gi phyogs su kha bltas pas //
T02TD1511E:311a-5: tog tse kham bzhi brgya ba pas blangs pa'i sa //
T02TD1511E:311a-6: zhi ba'i sems kyis gtor ma'i nang du ni //
T02TD1511E:311a-7: gzhag pa'am me mtshams la sogs phyir rol dor //
T02TD1511E:311a-8: 'bad pas de yi kham lnga pa yis //
T02TD1511E:311a-9: sa gzhi'i dbus su legs pa'i yid kyis dgra ma //
T02TD1511E:311a-10: kham lnga pa der las min du ma yin //
T02TD1511E:311a-11: phyogs dang mtshams su kun nas brko bar bya //
T02TD1511E:311a-12: shar nas cha ni nyi shu rtsa gcig dor //
T02TD1511E:311a-13: byang nas phyed dang bcu bzhi'i cha dor bas //
T02TD1511E:311a-14: shar nub cha dgu lho byang phyed dang lnga //
T02TD1511E:311a-15: 'di ni mchan gyi mdun du thog mar brko //
T02TD1511E:311a-16: de yis chos nor 'dod don 'phel zhing 'grub //
T02TD1511E:311a-17: gal te lho 'phye'i rgyal po gnas pa yi //
T02TD1511E:311a-18: cha dgu'i sa yi cha la brkos na ni //
T02TD1511E:311a-19: pham bu dang bu mo spun chung ma //
T02TD1511E:311a-20: mna' ma rang gi skye bo mdza' bshes 'chi //
T02TD1511E:311a-21: gal te rgyab tu brkos na rang 'chi zhing //
T02TD1511E:311a-22: yang na rang gnas nas 'pho nor brlag 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:311a-23: mjug mar glang chen rta dang me ha ra //
T02TD1511E:311a-24: ba lang 'chi zhing [?] stobs kyang nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:311a-25: gal te kham lnga'i nang du shing dang sgra //
T02TD1511E:311a-26: grog mkhar skra sen thal bas gnod pa 'byung //
T02TD1511E:311a-27: rdo bas rlung gis 'jig pa phub ma dang //
T02TD1511E:311a-28: mgal dum gyis rims rus pas zug zer ro //
T02TD1511E:311a-29: de'i don du thig chen 'debs pa na mtshan ma shes par bya ste /
T02TD1511E:311a-30: thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi'o //
T02TD1511E:311a-33: bya rgod dang bya k'a ka skra sgrogs na yon bdag go //
T02TD1511E:311a-34: byi las thig skud la 'gom na de'i 'am bod bu'i rus pa yod do //
T02TD1511E:311a-35: bod bus 'gom na de nyid kyi'o //
T02TD1511E:311a-37: ra lug gis ni de dag gi'o //
T02TD1511E:311a-38: rta yis ni de'i rus pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311a-39: glang po ches ni de'i'am rnga mo'i'o //
T02TD1511E:311a-40: ma he'am sha bas ni ce sbyang gi'o //
T02TD1511E:311a-41: dom gyis ni de'i rus ba'o //
T02TD1511E:311a-43: stag gis ni glang po che'i'o //
T02TD1511E:311a-46: rus sbal gyis ni de'i rus pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-2: de'i las mi'i nang nas gang rung mgo bo la 'phrug na mi gang gi 'og nas sel yod do //
T02TD1511E:311b-3: smin ma la reg na gser ram dol gong khru gsum gyi 'og na'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-4: mig la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na mu tig go //
T02TD1511E:311b-5: kha la reg na skra'am dol gong sum mdo'i 'og tsam na'o//
T02TD1511E:311b-6: so la reg na khru gsum gyi 'og na so'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-7: rna ba la 'phrug na de man chad kyi 'og na gser ram dngul lam byi ru'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-8: rke la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na mgul rgyan nam lcags sprog gam dol gong ngam sol ba khru gsum gyi 'og na'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-9: phrag pa la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na de'i rgyan no //
T02TD1511E:311b-10: mchan khung la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na lcags so //
T02TD1511E:311b-11: lag pa g-yas pa la reg na dku'i 'og na rgyab kyi thod pa'am sa las byas pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-12: lag pa g-yon pa la reg na bus mo'i 'og na shing khri'i rkang pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-13: brang la reg na dku tsam gyi 'og na phyugs kyi rus pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-14: rgyab la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na de'i rus pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-15: dku la reg na khru gnyis kyi 'og na lcags kyi phur bu'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-16: rtags la reg na khru gang gi 'og na lcags gsum gyis sel lo //
T02TD1511E:311b-17: byin pa la reg na mtho gang gi 'og na byin pa'i rus pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-18: long bu la reg na sor mo bco brgyad kyi 'og na rta'i rmig pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-19: rkang pa la reg na mtho gang tsam gyi 'og na shing s'a la ma la'i tsher ma'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-20: rkang pa'i mthe chung la reg na sor brgyad na 'khar ba'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-21: gang yang rung bas gang gi ming smos pa de'i der rus pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-22: gang du bas lci ba 'dor ba der gser ro //
T02TD1511E:311b-23: gzhon nu bshang ba btod na dngul lo //
T02TD1511E:311b-24: sbal pa sgra sgrogs na chu'i 'jigs pa'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-29: glang sgra sgrogs na dge ba'o //
T02TD1511E:311b-31: dung dang bkra shis kyi glu dang /
T02TD1511E:311b-32: byis pa sgra sgrogs na nor 'thob bo //
T02TD1511E:311b-39: nya zung la sogs pa mthong na legs pa'o zhes pa sa brko ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1511E:312a-0: de nas rdo ba la sogs pa bsal nas sa de nyid kyis sam des mi ldang na gzhan gyis la yang di bzangs kyi chus btab ste dong dgang @312a * //
T02TD1511E:312a-3: byang shar 'bab pas dngos grub ni //
T02TD1511E:312a-4: sngags pa rnams la rtag tu 'byung //
T02TD1511E:312a-5: dkyil mtho bas ni rgyal srid 'byung //
T02TD1511E:312a-8: yang na nor ni brlag par 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:312a-9: ji ltar bshad pa'i dma' ba ni //
T02TD1511E:312a-10: mtho na myur du rigs zad 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:312a-11: gal te sa yi dbus dma' na //
T02TD1511E:312a-12: sgrub pa po la gnod pa 'byung //
T02TD1511E:312a-14: khru gang nas ni brtsams nas su //
T02TD1511E:312a-15: ji srid khru ni stong gi bar //
T02TD1511E:312a-16: zhes gsungs pas bum pa'i phreng bas bskor ba'i ched du ji srid 'dod pa'i tshad kyis gru bzhir byas la de'i steng du mandala zlum po dpangs la khru phyed pa dbus cung zad mtho ba g-yas skor du 'bab dkar ba dbang ldan gyi phyogs dma' bar byas la h'um zhes pa dang /
T02TD1511E:312a-17: dum skyes ma bzlas pa'i dri'i chus btab la btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:312a-18: dkyil 'khor khang pa'i rtsa ba'i sgo yang dbang ldan kho nar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:312a-19: khang bzang rdo steng ba lang ltas //
T02TD1511E:312a-20: drang srong gnas sogs chu bo'i 'gram //
T02TD1511E:312a-21: sngon du 'dus byas gnas dag tu'ang //
T02TD1511E:312a-22: ma brkos na yang dag pa yin //
T02TD1511E:312a-23: sa sel nyes pa thams cad ni //
T02TD1511E:312a-24: gal te dbyung bar ma nus na //
T02TD1511E:312a-25: lag pas reg nas sngags bzlas te //
T02TD1511E:312a-26: de nyid dag pa chen po yin //
T02TD1511E:312a-27: zhes pa dum skyes ma'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad nas des bsngags pa'i yungs kar dang chu dang thal bas gtor ro //
T02TD1511E:312a-28: ba'i rnam pa lngas byugs la dri bzangs kyi chus gtor te /
T02TD1511E:312a-29: aom bhu kham zhes pa 'dis nam mkhar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:312a-30: h'um lam h'um zhes pa 'dis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD1511E:312a-31: las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i rin po che dang sman dang /
T02TD1511E:312a-32: 'bru lnga dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang du bcug la dri bzangs kyi chus byugs te /
T02TD1511E:312a-33: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sa'i lha mo nang du bstims la 'gro ba stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par lhag par mos nas yi ge gsum gyi byin gyis brlab cing dril bu dkrol zhing yi ge brgya pa gdon no //
T02TD1511E:312a-35: de la chu dang lci ba yis //
T02TD1511E:312a-36: dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byugs //
T02TD1511E:312a-37: dur khrod thal ba dang ldan pa //
T02TD1511E:312a-38: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD1511E:312b-0: de nas sa ni nyer byugs @312b nas //
T02TD1511E:312b-1: de la dkyil 'khor yang dag bri //
T02TD1511E:312b-2: zhes pa 'di ni sa sbyong ba'o //
T02TD1511E:312b-3: bde mchog mnyes par nus pa dang //
T02TD1511E:312b-4: sdom pa las gsungs bya bar ldan //
T02TD1511E:312b-5: phag mo la gus mnyes gshis pa //
T02TD1511E:312b-6: gtsang zhing brtson ldan bsod nams 'dod //
T02TD1511E:312b-7: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i pha rol son //
T02TD1511E:312b-8: chog shes slob mar 'os pa rnams //
T02TD1511E:312b-9: btus te sgo yi slob dpon bya //
T02TD1511E:312b-10: zhes gsungs pas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste rdo rje dang dril bu bzung ste /
T02TD1511E:312b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas srung pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pas bgegs bskrad nas spos phor thogs te h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i ljags kyis /
T02TD1511E:312b-12: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD1511E:312b-13: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1511E:312b-14: bdag ni che ge rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1511E:312b-17: dngos grub 'dir ni yang dag stsol //
T02TD1511E:312b-18: zhes pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa la snyan gsan phab nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i ma mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i phyogs su gnas pa rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor can slob ma bzhi yis sam gcig gis kyang de dang der rim gyis song ste bla ma'i mandala sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1511E:312b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD1511E:312b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1511E:312b-21: chos kun mchog ni bdag med pa //
T02TD1511E:312b-22: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bstan du gsol //
T02TD1511E:312b-23: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1511E:312b-24: mtshan min thams cad rnam par sbangs ;
T02TD1511E:312b-25: / kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor mchog ni bshad du gsol //
T02TD1511E:312b-26: zhi ba'i spyod mchog las byung ba //
T02TD1511E:312b-27: ye shes spyod pa rnam spyod mdzad //
T02TD1511E:312b-28: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor mchog ni bshad du gsol //
T02TD1511E:312b-29: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD1511E:312b-30: dag pa rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02TD1511E:312b-31: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog / dkyil 'khor kha los sgyur bshad gsol //
T02TD1511E:312b-32: gsol 'debs pa med na bsam gtan gyis kyang bya'o //
T02TD1511E:313a-0: de nas spro ba la sogs pa byas nas bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor @313a * //
T02TD1511E:313a-1: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mdzub mo gnyis brkyang la rtse mo sbyar ba kha 'og tu bstan nas spyi bor bzung zhing h'um badzrota tishthi zhes pas nam mkha' la bteg la skyil krung bshigs nas langs te kha lhor phyogs bas rkang pa mnyam par gnas pas spyi bor thal mo sbyar bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag byas nas sems can ma rig pas long zhing bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams mthong nas bdud bskrad par bya ste /
T02TD1511E:313a-3: dpal he ru ka dpal rnam 'byor che //
T02TD1511E:313a-4: bsgoms nas bdud ni brlag par bya //
T02TD1511E:313a-5: rab tu gdug pa'i tshogs ni bskrad //
T02TD1511E:313a-6: bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan yang ngo //
T02TD1511E:313a-7: 'bar ba'i h'um las byung ba yi //
T02TD1511E:313a-8: rdo rje rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod //
T02TD1511E:313a-9: mig g-yas g-yon du ma da las //
T02TD1511E:313a-10: skyes pa'i nyi ma zla ba bsam //
T02TD1511E:313a-11: g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu blang //
T02TD1511E:313a-12: g-yas ba rdo rje yang dag ldan //
T02TD1511E:313a-13: sems can don brtson khros pa yis //
T02TD1511E:313a-14: blo dang ldan pas phyogs kun blta //
T02TD1511E:313a-15: de ru gnas pa'i gdug pa gang //
T02TD1511E:313a-16: bdud dang bgegs dang log 'dren rnams /
T02TD1511E:313a-17: de rnams bskrad par bya ched du //
T02TD1511E:313a-18: tshig ni 'di dag nye bar brjod //
T02TD1511E:313a-19: gnas kyi bdag po gang rung rnams //
T02TD1511E:313a-20: klu dang gnod sbyin dri za sogs //
T02TD1511E:313a-22: sems can don du bya rtsom pas //
T02TD1511E:313a-23: shin tu myur bar song cig kye //
T02TD1511E:313a-24: khyed rnams kun nas phyir dengs shig / dpal he ru ka'i bka' thos nas //
T02TD1511E:313a-25: myur ba nyid du phyir khyer cig / gang zhig 'gro bar mi byed pa //
T02TD1511E:313a-26: de'i mgo bo bdag gi 'bar ba'i rdo rje yis /
T02TD1511E:313a-27: kha tv'am ga 'dis tshal pa brgyar dags par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:313a-28: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1511E:313a-29: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1511E:313a-30: aom grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1511E:313a-31: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga w'an badzra h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1511E:313a-32: me yi mtshams nas brtsams nas su //
T02TD1511E:313a-33: g-yon du bskor bas brtson pa yis //
T02TD1511E:313a-34: dpa' bo chen po khro bos bskor //
T02TD1511E:313a-35: bskal pa'i me ni langs ba ltar //
T02TD1511E:313a-36: zhes gsungs pas bdag khor bya zhing rdo rje bsor ba dang dril bu dkrol bas rdo rje'i 'gros kyis me mtshams su song la de nas brtsams te /
T02TD1511E:313b-0: g-yon skor du slob ma dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor @313b du rdo rje'i 'gros kyis gar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:313b-1: sgo re re rab bdag gi g-yon du gnas pa'i slob ma'i dril bu'i nang du rdo rje gzhug cing de'i rdo rje yang rang gi dril bu'i nang du'o //
T02TD1511E:313b-2: de ltar mdun dang rgyab du'o //
T02TD1511E:313b-3: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya //
T02TD1511E:313b-5: de dag rab tu sbyar ba yis //
T02TD1511E:313b-6: dngos grub thams cad yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1511E:313b-7: aom a'a: kha badzra dhri ka badzra h'um ka re na h'um zhes brjod cing mig gis dbang gis sta stangs bzhin shar phyogs su dus mnyam por g-yas brkyang gis gnas pa dang /
T02TD1511E:313b-8: slob mas brkyang gis gnas pas brjod pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1511E:313b-9: mya ngan khro ba snying stobs dang //
T02TD1511E:313b-10: de bzhin drag po'i bya ba gnyis //
T02TD1511E:313b-11: rang bzhin gyi ni ro 'di dag / dang po'i zhal la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1511E:313b-12: mi sdug pa dang ngo mtshar gnyis //
T02TD1511E:313b-13: 'jigs pa dang ni spro ba dag / rang bzhin gyis gnas ro 'dir bcas //
T02TD1511E:313b-14: g-yon pa'i zhal nas gnas pa'i gsung //
T02TD1511E:313b-15: dgod pa dang ni dga' ba dang //
T02TD1511E:313b-16: le lo snyom dang sgeg pa dang //
T02TD1511E:313b-17: rang bzhin gyis gnas po 'di dag / nub kyi zhal la yang dag gnas //
T02TD1511E:313b-18: smon pa dang ni rmad du byung gnyis //
T02TD1511E:313b-19: de bzhin dpa' bo'i dar dbyangs dang //
T02TD1511E:313b-20: dpa' ba dang ni 'jigs su rung //
T02TD1511E:313b-21: lho yi zhal la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1511E:313b-22: padma rdo rje'i bar du ni //
T02TD1511E:313b-23: gang zhig sems ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD1511E:313b-24: zhi ba de nyi yang dag dag / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i gar //
T02TD1511E:313b-25: de nyid shes la gar dang 'dir //
T02TD1511E:313b-26: gar gyi yod chos the tshom med //
T02TD1511E:313b-27: 'jig rten pa rnams dga' ba'i phyir //
T02TD1511E:313b-28: 'jig rten chos zhen gar gyed do //
T02TD1511E:313b-29: mgul rgyan la sogs pa'i stang bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1511E:313b-30: mgul rgyan stangs ni g-yon du ste //
T02TD1511E:313b-31: g-yas su de bzhin gdu bu'i stangs //
T02TD1511E:313b-32: rna rgyan bar rnams par dgod //
T02TD1511E:313b-33: gtsug gi nor bu de phyogs su //
T02TD1511E:313b-34: thal pa'i stangs ni g-yas su'o //
T02TD1511E:313b-36: gang ni zur mig zung blta zhing //
T02TD1511E:313b-37: he ru ka zhal 'o byed pa //
T02TD1511E:313b-38: phag mo yang ni gar byed de //
T02TD1511E:313b-39: kunda zla ba'i mdog ltar tshems //
T02TD1511E:313b-40: dkar mo h'um sgrogs khro mo ni //
T02TD1511E:313b-41: bgegs ni thams cad nyams byed ma //
T02TD1511E:313b-42: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rol //
T02TD1511E:313b-43: sems can don la brtson par byed //
T02TD1511E:313b-44: de dang ldan cig dpa' bo che //
T02TD1511E:314a-2: byed pa'i stangs la sogs pa'i spyod gur byas nas //
T02TD1511E:314a-3: de ltar go cha'i go bgos te //
T02TD1511E:314a-4: lha rnams spyod gur byas nas //
T02TD1511E:314a-5: de ltar go cha'i go bgos te //
T02TD1511E:314a-6: lha rnams kyis kyang 'byed mi nus //
T02TD1511E:314a-7: h'um byung khro mo du ma yis //
T02TD1511E:314a-8: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bkab nas su //
T02TD1511E:314a-9: rdo rje'i lta bas bya zhing //
T02TD1511E:314a-10: sngags pas yi ge bdun pa brjod //
T02TD1511E:314a-11: 'di ni sa yongs su gzung pa'o //
T02TD1511E:314a-12: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la dri'i mandala byugs te bam las skyes pa'i sa'i lha mo rnam bar bsgoms shing lag pa g-yas su zla ba la h'um gsum bsams nas sor mo'i rtse mos la lan gsum bsnun ba dang /
T02TD1511E:314a-13: de'i sgra dang h'um yig gi 'og zer gyis bskul bas bzhengs pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i tshul dang gcig tu gyur pa ser mo zhi ba na bza' dkar po can rgyan dang bcas pa dgyes pa g-yon na gser gyi bum pa bzang po dang /
T02TD1511E:314a-14: g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la mdun du mchod yon la sogs pas mchod de lhag par mos pas /
T02TD1511E:314a-15: skyob ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1511E:314a-16: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
T02TD1511E:314a-17: sa dang pha rol phyin rnams la //
T02TD1511E:314a-18: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD1511E:314a-19: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD1511E:314a-20: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02TD1511E:314a-21: de ltar bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02TD1511E:314a-22: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD1511E:314a-23: zhes pa lan gsum brjod nas lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:314a-25: mgon po bdag gis ci zhig bya //
T02TD1511E:314a-26: rdo rje 'dzin bka' bdag la gsol //
T02TD1511E:314a-27: khyed kyi bkra shis don du ni ;
T02TD1511E:314a-29: lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1511E:314a-30: mnyes nas mdzes ma 'di skad brjod //
T02TD1511E:314a-31: mgon po khyed kyi shes mod kyi //
T02TD1511E:314a-32: bsod nams phung po dri med pa //
T02TD1511E:314a-33: nga ni khyed nyid la gzhol zhing //
T02TD1511E:314a-34: kun nas khyed kyi dpang du gnas //
T02TD1511E:314a-35: khyed kyis bka' ni gang stsal //
T02TD1511E:314a-36: de ni bdag gis byed par brtson //
T02TD1511E:314a-37: zhes brjod nas de nyid la thim par bsam mo //
T02TD1511E:314a-38: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings nas //
T02TD1511E:314a-39: de yis sa ni mnan nas su //
T02TD1511E:314b-0: aom badzr'i bha ba h'um zhes pas lan gsum mngon par bsngags te rdo rje bcings pa las 'thon @314b pa'i 'bar ba'i h'um gi tshogs kyis sa 'og gi bar rdo rjer gyur par bsams la /
T02TD1511E:314b-1: aom badzr'i dri dha tishtha zhes pa lan gsum brjod pas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD1511E:314b-2: de nas sa gzhi rang dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa nor 'dzin ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1511E:314b-3: de nas phyi dro slob dpon khrus dang dri bzangs dang gos dmar po dang rgyan thams cad dang ldan pas /
T02TD1511E:314b-4: aom badzra aushn'i sha h'um phat /
T02TD1511E:314b-6: lan bdun bsngags pa'i gos dmar po'i dbu rgyan can dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil du kha lto ru bstan nas 'dug ste /
T02TD1511E:314b-7: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bya ba la dgos pa'i phyir dang po rdul tshon dkar pos padma 'dab brgyad bris pa'i lte ba ru rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'am /
T02TD1511E:314b-8: las thams cad pa'i bum pa bzhag la shar gyi 'dab ma la 'chad 'gyur ba'i chogs lhag gnas byas pa'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'i snod du gnas bya /
T02TD1511E:314b-11: nub dang mtshams bzhi'i 'dab ma rnams la ji ltar rigs par sa tshon lnga'i snod rnams so //
T02TD1511E:314b-12: he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i //
T02TD1511E:314b-13: rnal 'byor dbang phyugs nges byas pa //
T02TD1511E:314b-14: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD1511E:314b-15: bum pa rnams la lhag gnas bya //
T02TD1511E:314b-16: mgrin pa mthon zhing lto ba che //
T02TD1511E:314b-17: mchu 'phyang rtsa ba med pa dang //
T02TD1511E:314b-18: nag pho la sogs dang bral ba //
T02TD1511E:314b-19: zhes gsungs pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i bum pa'i nang zlum po'i ser bcug drug go //
T02TD1511E:314b-20: nang gi 'og nas kha'i mchu'i bar gyi dpangs la sor mo nyi shu'o //
T02TD1511E:314b-21: kha nas 'phyang pa'i mchu ni sor gnyis so //
T02TD1511E:314b-22: mgrin pa ni sor drug go //
T02TD1511E:314b-23: phrag pa sor gnyis dma' bar byas te /
T02TD1511E:314b-25: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor cho ga las //
T02TD1511E:314b-26: ma nu'i sor gyis de yid dpangs zhes so //
T02TD1511E:314b-27: kha ni mchu'i mtha' nas mchu mtha'i bar du sor brgyad do //
T02TD1511E:314b-28: sor brgyad kyi chag gnyis ni mgrin pa'i bu ga'o ;
T02TD1511E:314b-29: / cha gcig gis ni mchu gnyis kyi zhing ngo //
T02TD1511E:314b-30: gser ram dngul las byas pa yi //
T02TD1511E:314b-31: zangs sam sa las byas kyang rung //
T02TD1511E:314b-32: ji ltar rnyed pa bzung nas ni //
T02TD1511E:314b-33: brtul zhugs can gyis bum pa dgod //
T02TD1511E:315a-0: de stong pa nyid du bsgoms la bam las byung ba'i rin po che'i rang bzhin @315a * //
T02TD1511E:315a-1: tsandan nam 'bras btags pa'am sa dkar gyis dkar por byas te mtshan ma bris la /
T02TD1511E:315a-2: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri lnga'i chu dang /
T02TD1511E:315a-5: 'bru lnga nang du du blugs la 'dab mas kha brgyan pa phreng ba dang bcas pa /
T02TD1511E:315a-6: ras zung gis mgul pa dkris pa /
T02TD1511E:315a-7: dri bzangs kyi mandala gyi steng du rjes su mthun pa'i gdan la /
T02TD1511E:315a-8: aom badzra she kha ra ru ta ma ta d'i sham bandha bandha h'um zhes pa bdun bzlas pa'i srang bu dkar pos ras kyi steng du mgul pa bcings pa'o //
T02TD1511E:315a-10: byi ru dngul dang gser dang ni //
T02TD1511E:315a-11: padma r'a ga mu tig go //
T02TD1511E:315a-12: nas gro sran chung nag mo dang //
T02TD1511E:315a-13: til dang mu tig bum par gzhug / bri ha ti kanda ka ri dad //
T02TD1511E:315a-14: sa ha de ba gzhan mi thub //
T02TD1511E:315a-15: dan do tpa la'i rtsa ba ste //
T02TD1511E:315a-16: sman ni rnam pa lnga gzhug bya //
T02TD1511E:315a-17: aa mra au du mw'a ra dag //
T02TD1511E:315a-18: mya ngan med dang byang chub shing //
T02TD1511E:315a-19: klu shing yal ga lnga bzung nas //
T02TD1511E:315a-20: bum pa rnams kyi kha rgyan bya //
T02TD1511E:315a-21: ras ni dkar po che ba yis //
T02TD1511E:315a-22: bum pa'i mgul pa dkri bar bya //
T02TD1511E:315a-23: chog mkhas pas srad bu ni //
T02TD1511E:315a-24: dkar po ras kyi steng du dgod //
T02TD1511E:315a-25: dkyil 'khor pa ni thams cad kyi //
T02TD1511E:315a-26: sa bos yang phyag mtshan ni //
T02TD1511E:315a-27: gur gsum la sogs 'dus byas las //
T02TD1511E:315a-28: mkhas pas bum pa'i logs la dgod //
T02TD1511E:315a-29: du ngu ka dang aa ka rus //
T02TD1511E:315a-30: bdug cing dri lnga'i chu yis dgang //
T02TD1511E:315a-32: de la mtshan ma ni sna tshogs padma'i lte ba'i nyi mar dpal bde mchog gi rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa'o//
T02TD1511E:315a-33: las thams cad pa dum skyes ma'i gri gug go //
T02TD1511E:315a-34: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du /
T02TD1511E:315a-35: aom badzra aa mri da aud ka sha:h'um zhes pa 'di dang yi ge gsum lan bdun bzlas pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir byas te /
T02TD1511E:315a-36: rdo rje rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin phyi nang gi bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02TD1511E:315a-37: dri bzangs kyi chu dag ldan pa h'um gis bsngags pa'i dung dam padma'i snod dang me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i rdo rje bzhag nas dbus su /
T02TD1511E:315a-38: aom ta pte ta pte ma h'a ta pte sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:315a-39: zhes bya bas bkug pa'i lha yul gyi gangga'i chu'i ngo bo'i chu la lha'i 'khor lo gdan dang bcas pa skad cig gis bsams la /
T02TD1511E:315b-0: mdun du rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi @315b 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa la zhabs bsil dang /
T02TD1511E:315b-2: mchod yon phul bas de nas de dam tshig gi 'khor lo la bcug nas 'dod chags chan pos zhu bar gyur nas byang chub sems kyang ngo bor blugs pa'i chu dang rog gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD1511E:315b-3: mtshan ma la yang dam tshig gi lha ye shes kyi lha dang gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD1511E:315b-4: de nas h'um brjod cing rdo rje dang 'brel ba'i me tog gi phreng ba'i mthar g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung nas lo'i gtso bo'i snying po dang lha mo'i snying pos brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa /
T02TD1511E:315b-5: der dum skyes ma bzlas pa'i me tog dkar po gsum gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-6: de ltar bum pa gzhan yang rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa na lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02TD1511E:315b-7: khyad par du ni 'khor lo lnga la so sor ser re re ste lnga'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-8: yang na nang gi rim par gnas ba rnams kho na'i lnga'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-9: yang na de rnams kyi lnga dang 'khor lo bzhi'i bzhi ste dgu'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-10: yang na dbus kyi rim par gnas pa'am dam tshig 'khor lor gnas pa rnams kyi dang bcu gsum mo //
T02TD1511E:315b-11: thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs su gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD1511E:315b-12: mtshams su gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD1511E:315b-13: de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1511E:315b-14: sku'i 'khor lo yang ste bcu dgu'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-15: brjod pa'i phyogs dang lha so so'i dgod pa la yang las thams cad pa dum skyes ma'i lhag par dgod do //
T02TD1511E:315b-16: mtshan ma ni phyogs kyi 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gri gug gam bum pa tha dad pa'i phyogs la re re'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-17: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa rnams kyi gri gug nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-18: dpa' ba rnams gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir mtshan ma mi bri'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-19: khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi gri gug brgyad sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la'o //
T02TD1511E:315b-20: lus la ni byang chub kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i rtsa rnams kho na bum pa ste sems tshim par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1511E:315b-22: phyi yi bum pa'i mtshan ma gang //
T02TD1511E:315b-23: bshad pa thams cad ji ltar bar //
T02TD1511E:315b-24: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bum pa yi //
T02TD1511E:315b-25: mtshan nyid lus la yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1511E:316a-0: zhes dang bum pa lhag par gnas @316a * //
T02TD1511E:316a-2: / sngags pa lho ru kha bltas pa //
T02TD1511E:316a-3: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1511E:316a-4: he ru ka sbyor yang dag chags //
T02TD1511E:316a-6: mi sha dang bcas spos phor g-yon gyis bzung //
T02TD1511E:316a-7: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pas dkyil 'khor dri bzangs la sogs pas byugs te /
T02TD1511E:316a-8: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri bzangs kyis lha de dang de'i gnas su mandala zlum po byas te /
T02TD1511E:316a-9: de la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la zhabs bsil la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod cing bstod de //
T02TD1511E:316a-10: bdud rtsi myang ba byas la pus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs te /
T02TD1511E:316a-11: h'um las gyur pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce la h'um bkod la lag pa g-yas par spos phor thogs te g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02TD1511E:316a-12: bcom ldan 'das bde mchog rdo rje mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud ;
T02TD1511E:316a-13: / slob ma rnams la brtse don dang //
T02TD1511E:316a-14: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1511E:316a-15: mgon po snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD1511E:316a-17: de phyir bcom ldan bdag gus la //
T02TD1511E:316a-18: rab tu dgyes par mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD1511E:316a-20: 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1511E:316a-21: gzhan yang gang dag sngags kyi lha //
T02TD1511E:316a-22: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02TD1511E:316a-23: 'byung po byang chub bstan gnas dang //
T02TD1511E:316a-24: rdo rje spyan can sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1511E:316a-25: gang dag bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD1511E:316a-26: bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1511E:316a-27: bdag ni che ge rdo rje can //
T02TD1511E:316a-29: ji ltar nus pa nyer spyod pas //
T02TD1511E:316a-30: 'gro ba sbyang phyir bri bar bya //
T02TD1511E:316a-31: de phyir bdag ni slob bcas la //
T02TD1511E:316a-32: thugs rjes nye bar bzung nas ni //
T02TD1511E:316a-33: 'dus par gyur pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD1511E:316a-34: dkyil 'khor la ni nyer byar rigs //
T02TD1511E:316a-35: zhes pas ni mngon du byed cing lan gsum du brjod pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes pa lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1511E:316a-36: snga dro dpa' bo chen po ni //
T02TD1511E:316a-37: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1511E:316a-38: phag mo'i sbyor ba yis ni gnas //
T02TD1511E:316b-1: dam tshig nyams pa'i dogs pa yis //
T02TD1511E:316b-2: slob min gzhug par mi bya'o //
T02TD1511E:316b-3: zhes pas rang gis dbang ma byin na slob dpon gyi sngom pa byin la lhag par gnas par byas pa'i sgo'i slob dpon bzhi ste tha na gcig kyang rung ngo //
T02TD1511E:316b-4: lnga pa las kyi rdo rjer bya'o //
T02TD1511E:316b-5: lhag pa gnas par byas pa'i lha rnams mchod de blos nam mkha' la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:316b-6: dang po ru ni skya thig ste //
T02TD1511E:316b-7: de yi rjes la ye shes thig / phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsams nas //
T02TD1511E:316b-8: rnal 'byor pa yis cho gas gdab //
T02TD1511E:316b-9: de nas ro yi srad bu ni //
T02TD1511E:316b-10: khrag chen po yis byugs pa yis //
T02TD1511E:316b-11: dpal he ru ka'i pho brang mchog / dkyil 'khor 'jigs su rung ba gdab //
T02TD1511E:316b-12: rab byung me tog gis byugs la //
T02TD1511E:316b-13: rnal 'byor rig pas thod par gzhag / srad bu dam pa mngon par bsngags //
T02TD1511E:316b-14: mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags kyis bsrung //
T02TD1511E:316b-15: bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1511E:316b-16: cho ga bzhin du kha dog lnga //
T02TD1511E:316b-17: srad bu de ni gcig tu dril //
T02TD1511E:316b-18: sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1511E:316b-19: dza: dza: dza: zhes mdun gnas pa'i /
T02TD1511E:316b-20: slob ma la ni gtang bar bya //
T02TD1511E:316b-21: de nas slob mas kyang ni brjod //
T02TD1511E:316b-22: dza: dza: dza: zhes rang mdun du ;
T02TD1511E:316b-23: / cung zad ye shes dang ldan pas //
T02TD1511E:316b-24: gzhon nu gzhon nu ma mchog la //
T02TD1511E:316b-25: dba' bo rnal 'byor ma phab nas //
T02TD1511E:316b-26: thig 'debs pa ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1511E:316b-27: bde mchog 'khor lo de gnyis kyis //
T02TD1511E:316b-28: legs par mdzad pa gsal bar mthong //
T02TD1511E:316b-29: gnas la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams //
T02TD1511E:316b-30: lhan cig skyes pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1511E:316b-31: rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang //
T02TD1511E:316b-32: rdul tshon yang ni gdab pa dag / sems can dman pas mi bya ste //
T02TD1511E:316b-33: byas na byang chub stobs med do //
T02TD1511E:316b-34: zhes gsungs pas kha lhor phyogs te dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i rnal 'byor can mtshan ma thob pas gzhon nu ma nyams pas bkal ba'am dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i skud pa lnga pa lnga snod lngar gnas pa rnams dri zhim po'i tshon dkar po dang /
T02TD1511E:317a-0: nag po rnams dang yungs kar gyi phye ma rnams dang bdud rtsi lnga bsres @317a * //
T02TD1511E:317a-1: pa rnams kyis so sor kha bsgyur te g-yon pa'i lag mthil du sor mo'i rtse mo nas brtsams te mthe bong gi rtsa ba'i bar du bkod nas //
T02TD1511E:317a-2: bhr'um aam hr'i: kham h'um gi yi ge rnams las skyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bor bsgoms nas nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol ba'i rang gi phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs kar bhr'um la sogs pa las skyes pa'i ye shes kyi skud pa 'od zer dang bcas pa bltas nas /
T02TD1511E:317a-3: aom a'a: d'a ki ni badzra su tram me pra yatstsha ma h'a mandala s'u tra n'a ya h'um zhes pa dang /
T02TD1511E:317a-4: ming bsgyur bas gzhan la ste /
T02TD1511E:317a-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bzhin mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD1511E:317a-6: mig gnyis dza: las skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po'i rang bzhin gyi /
T02TD1511E:317a-7: aom d'i pti dra shti aangku sha dza: zhes brjod nas /
T02TD1511E:317a-8: mig rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig gi rdzi mas 'gugs shing 'bar ba'i lta ba lcags kyu bzhin gyis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa btang bas bkug nas lag pa na gnas pa'i rang rang gi kha dog can gyi skud pa'i nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:317a-9: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa rnams la ye shes bzhi rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir /
T02TD1511E:317a-10: nyi shu lngar phye ba'i srad bu me'i mtshams su gnas pa'i slob dpon las thams cad pa'i gzugs skud pa bzung ba dang lhan cig dkyil du gnas pa'i slob dpon gyis dril bar bya ste de nas lnga srad bu gcig tu'o //
T02TD1511E:317a-11: aom a'a: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga t'a: sarba dharm'a: par sba ra aa nu pra bishti sarba dharm'a aa tyan ta aa nu pra bashti: sarba dharm'a h'um zhes brjod cing dril ba slob dpon dang slob ma'i lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mo nas brtsams te sor mo bzhi'i nang du bcug la rgyab nas bskor nas yang bcug ste bskor la de dag gis rdo rje khu tshur byas pa kho na'i mdzub mo'i rgyab kyi sa la bzhag ste dman pa'i bar dor nas /
T02TD1511E:317a-12: ji ltar dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur du ring bar gyur pa nas kyi tshad kyis sngom pa bdud rtsi lnga dang ba'i rnam pa lngas spangs pa yi ge gsum nang du chud par byas la snod gtsang mar bzhag ste mchod la lag pas bkab ste las thams cad la bzlas te /
T02TD1511E:317b-0: mig g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ma dang ta las nyi ma @317b dang zla ba dag gis sngar bzhin du badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bas brtan par byas te las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu dang yungs kar gyis bran la rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pas reg la /
T02TD1511E:317b-1: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bzlas nas /
T02TD1511E:317b-2: yi ge gsum gyis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:317b-3: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'um phat ces pa'i sngags kyis bum pa thams cad kyi chus gtor te de dag par byas pa ste dris byugs la /
T02TD1511E:317b-4: phyi rol du me tog bkram la nam mkhar gnas pa'i ye shes 'khor lo bltas la mchod yon la sogs pas mchod cing btung la /
T02TD1511E:317b-5: rang yang de'i rnal 'byor can dang las thams cad pa'i gzugs kyis slob ma'i g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i mig dag la dza: las skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po bsams la rdo rje'i 'gros kyis thig skud de g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas lte bar bzung ste /
T02TD1511E:317b-6: sgrub pa'i grogs kyis kyang de bzhin du bzung ba'i skud pa de dza: yig gsum dang /
T02TD1511E:317b-7: dza: yig gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs po de la gtad par bsams la sngags des de bzhin du bkug par bsams la /
T02TD1511E:317b-8: slob dpon byang du gnas shing kha lhor bltas pa dang nub tu kha bltas te shar du gnas pas rang gi mdun du gnas pa'i slob ma dang bcas pas lte ba dang mnyam pa'i nam mkha' la gdab cing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa'i mthe bong dang ming med kyis thig skud bzung ste gdab pa'i sgra bya'o //
T02TD1511E:317b-9: thig gdab pa thams cad du yang /
T02TD1511E:317b-10: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram ma ti kra ma h'um bhr'um aom hr'i: kham h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD1511E:317b-11: de thams cad thig skud de'i sgras nam mkha' khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskul te de dag kyang byon te thig skud kyi nang du thim pa'o //
T02TD1511E:317b-12: de'i dus su nam mkha'i thig bzhin du sa la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis lag pa gnyis mnyam du bab bas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:317b-14: dang po gshin rjer kha bltas te //
T02TD1511E:317b-15: 'khor lo'i sa yi byang du gnas //
T02TD1511E:317b-16: mkha' dang sa la thig gdab bya //
T02TD1511E:317b-17: blo ldan dang bcas g-yon skor du //
T02TD1511E:318a-2: slar yang tshangs pa'i thig gnyis la //
T02TD1511E:318a-3: mer gnas nub tu kha bltas pas //
T02TD1511E:318a-4: lho yi char ni thig gdab bya //
T02TD1511E:318a-5: rlung nas shar du kha bltas bas //
T02TD1511E:318a-6: byang gi char ni gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:318a-7: slob dpon bskor te rlung gnas shing //
T02TD1511E:318a-8: lhor ni mngon du phyogs par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:318a-9: nub kyi char ni btab nas su //
T02TD1511E:318a-10: sngags pa byang du mngon phyogs shing //
T02TD1511E:318a-11: mi yi gnas su gnas pa yis //
T02TD1511E:318a-12: shar gyi cha thig brtsam par bya //
T02TD1511E:318a-13: me la sogs par gnas pa yis //
T02TD1511E:318a-14: mtshams kyi thig ni gdab bar bya //
T02TD1511E:318a-15: phyogs sogs dbye ba shes nas su //
T02TD1511E:318a-16: thig gdab pa ni brtsam par bya //
T02TD1511E:318a-18: de la thog mar mandala khru gang ba'i dkyil du btsugs pa'i grib tshod kyi shing bu mtho gang pa'i grib ma nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i dus su nang du 'jug pa dang /
T02TD1511E:318a-19: phyir 'byung ba'i rtse mo dkyil 'khor gyi re kh'a'i dkyil du gang 'jug pa der thig le gnyis byas pa ni nub pa dang shar yin no //
T02TD1511E:318a-20: de'i steng du skud pa khru gang pa bzung la mandala gnyis byas pas nyer 'byung ngo //
T02TD1511E:318a-21: mjug ma dang kha'i mthar byas pa'i thig le lho dang byang gi steng du srad bu bzung ste mandala gzhan gnyis bya'o //
T02TD1511E:318a-22: dkyil 'khor ma byas par 'char ba'i dang nub pa'i tshe sor bcu gnyis pa'i shing gi grib ma'i rtse mor byas pa'i thig le gnyis dus rtag tu nub dang shar yin no zhes pa man ngag go //
T02TD1511E:318a-23: thog yod pa'i sa ru phyogs bzhir thig le bzhi byas la sngar bzhin mandala bzhi byas te /
T02TD1511E:318a-24: de la phyogs kun du nya'i kha dang mjug ma'i dkyil du bzung nas me ri'i mtha'i bar du tshangs pa'i thig gnyis g-yon pa skyil krung phyed pa byas te rkang pa g-yas pa sa la btsugs te /
T02TD1511E:318a-25: de las bzlog par gnas pa'i slob ma dang bcas pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i thig skud kyis phyir bskyed cing gdab po //
T02TD1511E:318a-26: mtshan min gyis ni grub pa med //
T02TD1511E:318a-27: thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi //
T02TD1511E:318a-28: phra zhing sbom pa las ni nad //
T02TD1511E:318a-29: phyogs la rmongs na slob ma 'khrul //
T02TD1511E:318a-30: g-yas skor gyi ni sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1511E:318a-31: slob ma 'chi bar bshad pa yin //
T02TD1511E:318b-1: / sgo yi nyi shu yi ni cha'i //
T02TD1511E:318b-2: skud pas dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
T02TD1511E:318b-3: bdag nyid lus kyis mkhas pas bri //
T02TD1511E:318b-5: 'khor dang bcas pa'i rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dir sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i mtha' yongs su bcad pa rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol du cha chung brgyad pa'i bar du ste cha chung bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1511E:318b-6: de'i phyi rol du cha chung bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD1511E:318b-11: bzhi nyid du rim gyis rta babs dang /
T02TD1511E:318b-15: gnyis rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD1511E:318b-16: bzhi 'od zer gyi cha rnams te logs gcig la ni cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02TD1511E:318b-17: logs gnyis par yang de ltar ro //
T02TD1511E:318b-18: zhes pas thig skud cha chung dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD1511E:318b-19: 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ni sgo ste de'i bzhi cha chung ngo //
T02TD1511E:318b-20: tshangs pa'i gzhogs gnyis su cha chung gnyis gnyis rtsa ba'i thig gis dang lhan cig cha chung bzhi pa'i sgo bcom ldan 'das kyi skus g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i mig gnyis kyi yi ges zla ba dang nyi mar bsgoms la /
T02TD1511E:318b-21: khro bo'i lta bas kun du blta zhing h'i h'i zhes brjod cing thar pa'i sgo'i rnam bar 'ching ba'i sgrib par gyur pa dbyi bar bya'o zhes lhag par mos pas dbyi bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:318b-23: rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du go rims bzhin du gcig dang /
T02TD1511E:318b-28: gcig gi bar dor nas thig drug ni mtshams kyi thig las thad kar 'thon pa ste /
T02TD1511E:318b-29: de la dang po ni panytsa ri kh'a'i'o //
T02TD1511E:318b-30: gnyis pa ni gar gyi snam bu ste de gnyis kyi rtse mo la reg pa'i cha bcu gnyis pa'i thig dang ldan pa'i tshangs thig nas /
T02TD1511E:318b-31: cha chung gsum gyi bar du gnas pa'o //
T02TD1511E:318b-32: gsum pa ni rin chen pa gu dang dra ba dra phyed dang ;
T02TD1511E:318b-33: rin chen shar bu rnams kyis ste cha chung brgyad spang bar ro //
T02TD1511E:318b-34: gzhan ni zur thig gzhan gyi bar du ste mda' yab kyi'o //
T02TD1511E:318b-35: de nas gar gyi snam bu las byung ba'i thig bzhi ste //
T02TD1511E:318b-36: de la gcig ni dar dpyangs kyi sa ste thad ka'i thig gsum gyi rtse mo la reg pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319a-1: gzhogs su cha chung re re'i bar du rta babs kyi ga ba dang bar snang dang rdul tshon gyis ste gsum mo //
T02TD1511E:319a-2: bzhi po 'di rnams las dang po gsum ni srid du cha chung lnga pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319a-3: bzhi pa ni cha chung bzhi'o //
T02TD1511E:319a-4: dkyil 'khor dang rta babs kyi bar snang gi sa ni mun pa'i snam bur yang brjod do //
T02TD1511E:319a-5: de nas tshangs thig gi logs su cha chung gnyis spangs par rtsa ba'i thig nas sgo khyud cha chung bzhi btab nas thad kar 'gram pa cha chung gnyis su song nas steng du cha chung gnyis pa'i logs kyi thig gcig gnyis 'khyog pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319a-6: de'i rtse mo nas thad kar 'thon te tshangs thig nas logs gzhan du gnas pa'i de lta bu'i kyog po'i rtse mo'i bar du cha chung brgyad pa'i gdung gi thig gcig go //
T02TD1511E:319a-7: de bzhin du de'i logs kyi thig gi rtse mo nas //
T02TD1511E:319a-8: gzhan de'i logs kyi thig gi rtse mo'i bar du cha chung bcu pa panytsa re kh'a'i thig gcig go //
T02TD1511E:319a-9: de'i phyi cha chung gcig ni bar snang gi snam bu'o //
T02TD1511E:319a-10: bri ba'i dkyil 'khor la dar dpyangs thig la thug par mda' yab bo //
T02TD1511E:319a-11: bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni logs kyi steng gi bar ro //
T02TD1511E:319a-12: gdung gi 'og tu yang ka ba gnyis ma bris kyang bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor la shes par bya ste /
T02TD1511E:319a-13: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02TD1511E:319a-15: logs kyi ka ba ni rta babs rnams kho na'i'o //
T02TD1511E:319a-16: rdul tshon gyi rtsig pa la ni rin po che dang /
T02TD1511E:319a-20: mda' yab rnams rim gyis steng nas steng du gnas pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319a-21: rin chen shar bu thog gi mtha' nas 'phyang ba'o //
T02TD1511E:319a-22: ka ba'i steng du rta babs ni cha chung bcu gnyis so //
T02TD1511E:319a-23: de la ka ba'i rtse mo'i phyi rol du thig bcu gcig ste bar rnams su gser dang /
T02TD1511E:319a-24: rin po che'i shar bu dang /
T02TD1511E:319a-30: rin po cha'i shar bu dang /
T02TD1511E:319a-33: mda' yab kyi snam bu rnams so //
T02TD1511E:319a-34: de rnams kyi mun pa'i snam bu gnyis ni so sor dpangs su cha chung phyed dang gnyis te snam bu dgu ni so sor cha chung re re'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-0: bcu gcig po 'di'i thad ka'i @319b tshad ni ;
T02TD1511E:319b-1: tshangs pa'i g-yas dang g-yon du ni //
T02TD1511E:319b-2: cha chung phyed bcas mda' yi mthar //
T02TD1511E:319b-3: snam bu cha chung phyed dang gsum //
T02TD1511E:319b-4: thig ni cha chung phyed dang bzhi //
T02TD1511E:319b-5: cha chung drug mthar gnyis pa dang //
T02TD1511E:319b-6: gsum pa cha chung gsum pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-7: cha chung bzhi mthar bzhi pa ni //
T02TD1511E:319b-8: cha chung lnga ste mda' phyed bcas //
T02TD1511E:319b-9: gsum dor nas ni phyed dang lnga //
T02TD1511E:319b-10: gsum na dus ni cha chung lnga //
T02TD1511E:319b-11: bzhi ni cha chung bdun rnams te //
T02TD1511E:319b-12: drag bo'i thig ni cha chung mda' //
T02TD1511E:319b-13: snam bu lnga pa'i steng gi ni //
T02TD1511E:319b-14: thad kar cha chung phyed dang bzhi //
T02TD1511E:319b-15: bdun pa'i 'og la chu chung gsum //
T02TD1511E:319b-16: steng ni cha chung drug de nas //
T02TD1511E:319b-17: snam bu rnam mthar steng song thim //
T02TD1511E:319b-18: nang ni de bzhin lhan cig go //
T02TD1511E:319b-19: kyog po gcig go 'di nang du'ang //
T02TD1511E:319b-20: cha chung phyed nas de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD1511E:319b-21: zhes bshad pas tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon du cha chung phyed dang drug dor bar snam bu dang po cha chung phyed dang gsum pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-22: de'i steng du thig dang po cha chung phyed dang bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-23: cha chung drug gi bar dor bar gnyis pa dang gsum pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-24: cha chung bzhi dor bar bzhi ba cha chung lnga pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-25: cha chung phyed dang bzhi dor bar lnga pa cha chung phyed dang lnga pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-26: cha chung gsum dor bar drug pa cha chung lnga pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-27: bdun pa la sogs pa bzhi ni cha chung bdun pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-28: bcu gcig pa ni cha chung lnga ba'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-29: 'dir snam bu lnga pa'i thad kar steng du cha chung phyed dang bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-30: bdun pa'i 'og la cha chung gsum ste steng la cha chung drug pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-31: snam bu rnams re re zhing gi phyi rol gyi mtha'i gyen du ji srid pa'i thig gcig go //
T02TD1511E:319b-32: nang gi mthar yang dang po'i thig gi cha chung phyed dor nas steng du 'greng ba'i thig gcig go //
T02TD1511E:319b-33: gcig po de ni rgyu ba'i thig gzhan dang 'brel bas 'khyog por mthong ste ji ltar mdzes par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-34: 'di'i nang rin po che la sogs pa bri ba'i don du cha chung phyed dor nas de bzhin du thig kyog po gcig go //
T02TD1511E:319b-35: steng du chu srin gyi kha las 'thon pa'i pa tra la sogs pa ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1511E:319b-36: rta babs kyi steng gi tshangs thig la chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'am brgyad pa cha chung gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1511E:320a-2: de'i ngos gnyis la mda' yab kyi steng du 'khor lo la mngon du phyogs pa'i ri dags dang ri dags mo 'khor lo las cha chung phyed du ring bar gnas pa ste /
T02TD1511E:320a-3: cha chung gcig tu mgrin pa dang bcas pa'i gdong 'grel zhing 'khor lo'i rtse mor mag blta ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:320a-4: 'khor lo'i phyi rol du sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo cha chung gnyis te 'khor lo'i rva'i bar du mthong ba'o //
T02TD1511E:320a-5: g-yas g-yon gyi rva ni rta babs kyi gzhogs rnams su dar dpyangs kyi snam bu'i steng du chu srin gyi kha nas 'thon te /
T02TD1511E:320a-6: cung zad thad kar song nas phyir byung ba dbus kyi rgyar cha chung gsum pa srid du cha chung bcu drug pa'o //
T02TD1511E:320a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng gi phur pa mgo rtse gcig pa steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rnam pa h'um las skyes par bsams nas /
T02TD1511E:320a-8: pur bu gdab pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas brdung ba'i sngags kyis rdo rje tho bas brdungs te /
T02TD1511E:320a-9: de la thig skud cha chung dgu bcu rtsa drug pa nyis lta ba tu byas pa btags la me'i mtshams nas brtsams te g-yon skor du rva'i rtse mo las phyir padma'i ge sar gyi ri mo zlum po sa bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:320a-10: de'i phyi rol du cha chung gnyis pa'i padma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba'i thig zlum po'o ;
T02TD1511E:320a-11: / de'i phyi rol du cha chung gnyis pa'i rdo rje phreng ba'i thig ste sra zhing 'thas pa 'khor sa chen po'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1511E:320a-12: de'i phyir cha chung bzhi pa'i me ri'i thig go //
T02TD1511E:320a-13: khor yug de'i phyi rol du ni shing la sogs pa'i rung khrod brgyad de /
T02TD1511E:320a-14: 'on kyang skal pa dang mi ldan pa'i gnas su mi bya'o//
T02TD1511E:320a-15: sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams su cha chung gcig pa'i zla ba'i cha la gnas pa'i rin po che dmar po'i steng du rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1511E:320a-16: stegs bu gru bzhi la gnas pa'i bu ma pa la gnas pa'i rta babs kyi ka ba rnams so //
T02TD1511E:320a-17: de rnams kyi rtsa ba dang rtse mo la nor bu bcings pa'i dkyil du glang po che'i steng du lag pa brkyang pa'i seng ga'o //
T02TD1511E:320a-18: padma'i 'dab ma phyed pa lta bu'i mda' yab la gser gyi bum par gnas pa phyogs su rgyal mtshan dang ba dan brgyad do //
T02TD1511E:320a-20: rnga yab dang bcas pa dril chung gi sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD1511E:320b-0: zur bzhi @320b la ni gdugs rnams so //
T02TD1511E:320b-1: rta babs rnams la bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD1511E:320b-4: rmig pa dang ba ran gyi mtha' ru rgyal mtshan dang ba dan no //
T02TD1511E:320b-5: rta babs kyi logs kun du bum pa bzang po las byung ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing glang po che la sogs pa rin po che bdun dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02TD1511E:320b-6: tshangs dang zur thig gnas pa las //
T02TD1511E:320b-7: gzhan min de yi tshangs las phyir //
T02TD1511E:320b-8: cha chung gnyis dor rtsa ba'i bar //
T02TD1511E:320b-9: thig gdab zur gyi 'gram dag tu //
T02TD1511E:320b-10: de bzhin lte ba'i logs dag tu //
T02TD1511E:320b-11: sgo ni bzhi bzhir de yi srid //
T02TD1511E:320b-12: lte ba'i phyi ru cha chung bzhi //
T02TD1511E:320b-13: dor bar cha chung bzhi pa'i thig / thad kar tshangs dang zur la gnas //
T02TD1511E:320b-14: 'dir ni yang na thig lnga yang //
T02TD1511E:320b-15: cha chung gnyis gnyis dor bar ro //
T02TD1511E:320b-16: de bzhin de rnams dang drug pa //
T02TD1511E:320b-17: mtshams su yang dag son pa la'o //
T02TD1511E:320b-18: tshangs pa dang ni zur thig gi //
T02TD1511E:320b-19: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i bdun rnams las //
T02TD1511E:320b-20: lnga pa gsum pa'i dang po yin //
T02TD1511E:320b-21: cha chung gcig gi mtha' las 'thon //
T02TD1511E:320b-22: rang gi gnyis pa'i rtser son nas //
T02TD1511E:320b-23: bdun pa yi ni dbus su song //
T02TD1511E:320b-24: thig gcig kyog po lnga ru 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:320b-25: de yi nang du'ang cha chung phyed //
T02TD1511E:320b-26: dor nas de bzhin gzhan yin no //
T02TD1511E:320b-27: tshangs las rim bzhin rgyal po dang //
T02TD1511E:320b-28: nyi klu chu mig cha chung ni //
T02TD1511E:320b-29: dor bar zlum po'i thig lnga'o //
T02TD1511E:320b-30: dang po gsum dang nang du yang //
T02TD1511E:320b-31: cha chung phyed phyed dor nas thig / zlum po gsum po rtsibs zlum gyi //
T02TD1511E:320b-32: thig las gzhan ni dbyi bar bya //
T02TD1511E:320b-34: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du lte ba'i logs gnyis su tshangs pa dang zur gyi thig bzhi bzhi'i g-yas g-yon du cha chung gnyis kyi bar nas sgo bzhi bzhi'i tshang du thig re re gdab po //
T02TD1511E:320b-35: de nas lte ba'i phyi rol du cha chung bzhi'i bar las 'dab ma'i mtha' ma'i thig las cha chung gnyis kyi bar du thad ka'i thig tshangs pa dang zur dang de dag gi thig gi steng du sgo'i tshad do //
T02TD1511E:320b-36: de'i phyir de bzhin du thig lnga'o //
T02TD1511E:320b-37: zur dang de'i thig gi steng du drug pa yang ngo //
T02TD1511E:321a-0: de la tshangs pa'i g-yas su dang po'i cha chung gi mthar zhugs te bzhi pa'i rtse mor son nas lnga pa'i cha chung @321a * //
T02TD1511E:321a-1: gcig gi mthar zhugs te drug pa'i rtse mor son nas bdun pa'i cha chung gcig gi mthar zhugs pa'i thig kyog po gcig go / de'i nang du cha chung phyed dor nas de dang 'dra ba'i kyog po'i thig gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1511E:321a-2: de ltar tshangs pa'i g-yon dang gzhan kun la yang ngo//
T02TD1511E:321a-3: mtshams thig kun la yang ngo //
T02TD1511E:321a-4: de nas lte bar thig skud bzung ste rtsa ba'i thig nas brtsams te nang du sgo re re'i bar du zlum po'i thig bzhi'o //
T02TD1511E:321a-6: rtsa pa'i thig nas nyer bzung ste //
T02TD1511E:321a-7: zlum po'i thig ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1511E:321a-8: 'khor lo gsum ni sgo tshad du //
T02TD1511E:321a-9: yang dag bskor bas phyin pa'o //
T02TD1511E:321a-11: 'di las lhag chad zung zad med //
T02TD1511E:321a-12: thugs sogs 'khor lo'i mu khyud la //
T02TD1511E:321a-15: de la dang po gsum po rnams kyi nang du cha chung phyed dor bar zlum po'i thig gcig go //
T02TD1511E:321a-16: bzhi pa'i ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba'i nang mtshon pa ste /
T02TD1511E:321a-17: de'i nang du cha chung gcig gi bzhi cha nas pha rol cha chung phyed dang gsum pa'i 'dab ma dor bar lte ba'i don du zlum po'i thig gcig go //
T02TD1511E:321a-18: rtsibs kyi logs kyi steng du rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD1511E:321a-19: 'dir phyi rol gyi rtsibs kyi thig rnams bsrungs la gzhan ni dbyi bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:321a-20: nang gi lus la de bzhin du //
T02TD1511E:321a-21: he ru ka mchog thig gdab bya //
T02TD1511E:321a-22: lhan skyes rang bzhin yang dag dag / dba' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan //
T02TD1511E:321a-24: de nas gtor ma btang la /
T02TD1511E:321a-25: dur khrod rus pa yang dag blang //
T02TD1511E:321a-26: thal ba lo ma so phag rnams //
T02TD1511E:321a-27: ba bla dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD1511E:321a-28: he ru ka yi 'khor lo bri //
T02TD1511E:321a-29: thod par sa tshon bzhag nas su //
T02TD1511E:321a-30: rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1511E:321a-31: 'bar ba'i lta bas ye shes kyi //
T02TD1511E:321a-32: 'khor lo'i thugs gnas bkug nas su //
T02TD1511E:321a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad mkha' 'gro ma'i //
T02TD1511E:321a-34: sngags kyi mngon par bsngags nas su //
T02TD1511E:321a-35: he ru ka dpal rgyal po dang //
T02TD1511E:321a-36: 'khor lo'i dbus su yang dag gnas //
T02TD1511E:321b-0: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pas bam lam ram ham yam gi sa ben las byung @321b ba'i dkar po dang /
T02TD1511E:321b-4: nag po'i tshon rnams zla shel la sogs pa las byung ba'am //
T02TD1511E:321b-6: 'bras s'a lu las byung ba bhr'um aam hr'i: khom h'um las skyes pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i tshul du bsams nas /
T02TD1511E:321b-7: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i rgyal ba lnga'i thugs kar bhr'um la sogs pas mngon par bsngags te /
T02TD1511E:321b-8: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD1511E:321b-9: zhes pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te 'bar ba'i lta bas yang dag par spong zhing re re zhing la h'i bkod nas /
T02TD1511E:321b-10: bden pa gang gis sems can rnams rdul tshon mang zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la chags pas rjes su chags pa'i bden pa des rdul tshon rnams 'bar bar gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi spar bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:321b-11: lha bsgom pa phul du byung ba las ni 'bar ro //
T02TD1511E:321b-12: dri ngang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas snod brtan par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:321b-13: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba na gnas pa'i phur bu /
T02TD1511E:321b-14: aom badzra k'i la auta k'i l'a ya sarba k'i lan badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya h'um h'um h'um h'um phat ho //
T02TD1511E:321b-15: zhes pa h'um bzhi pa'i sngags kyis bton la /
T02TD1511E:321b-16: blos rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la bstims te phur bu'i khung bur sngar ma bcug na rin po che dang sman dang 'bru lnga bcug la rdul tshon lngas kun nas bkang ste mnyam por byas nas /
T02TD1511E:321b-17: dril bu'i sgra dang rdo rje'i glus mtshan ma ngan pa bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:321b-18: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02TD1511E:321b-19: sems can khams ni ra ba sgrol mdzad //
T02TD1511E:321b-20: rang nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1511E:321b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1511E:321b-22: nyes pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD1511E:321b-23: 'khor lo'i nang du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1511E:321b-24: zhes pas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par mos nas ngang por dkyil 'khor gyi nad du 'dug ste /
T02TD1511E:321b-25: blo dang ldan pas me mtshams nas lag pa g-yon pas g-yon skor gyis dkar po dang /
T02TD1511E:321b-29: nag po'i tshon rnams kyi phyi rol nas brtsams te kha shar du phyogs pas aom badzra ti tra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod cing bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-1: mo mkhan la sogs pa gzhan gyis kyang dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-2: sgo yi nyi shu cha ru ni //
T02TD1511E:322a-3: re kh'a mnyam por dgye bar bya //
T02TD1511E:322a-4: sbom por bkye bas nad 'byung zhing //
T02TD1511E:322a-5: phra mo yis ni nor rnams nyams //
T02TD1511E:322a-6: yon po yis ni rnam par sdang //
T02TD1511E:322a-7: chad na bla ma slob dpon 'chi ;
T02TD1511E:322a-8: / g-yas skor du ni bkye ba yis //
T02TD1511E:322a-9: tshon rnams phur bus btab par 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:322a-11: lho yis gzhi nag po shar //
T02TD1511E:322a-12: ljang gu de bzhin byang ni dmar //
T02TD1511E:322a-13: nub tu yang ni ser po ste //
T02TD1511E:322a-14: thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo rnams //
T02TD1511E:322a-15: sngon po dmar po dkar po cher //
T02TD1511E:322a-16: gsang sngags rig pas yid 'od bri //
T02TD1511E:322a-17: tshon dgye ba la nyes pa gang //
T02TD1511E:322a-18: de nyid bsams pa'i sbyor rnams la //
T02TD1511E:322a-19: sus kyang bar chad bya mi nus //
T02TD1511E:322a-20: rdo rje'i shugs kyi ye shes rdul tshon gyi re kh'a yid kyis nam mkha' la bteg nas aom badzra be ga aa kra ma h'um zhes brjod cing thig la sogs pa la 'goms kyang nyes pa med do //
T02TD1511E:322a-21: gar gyi snam bu ni dmar po'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-22: rin chen snam bu ni sa gzhi dmar po la rin po che sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-23: sa gzhi nag po la dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-24: sa gzhi sngon po la rin chen shar bu dang mda' yab dkar po'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-25: rmig pa dang ba ran ni ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-26: mun pa ni nam mkha'i mdog go //
T02TD1511E:322a-28: ri dags ni gser la rin po ches spras pa'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-29: sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra ni phyogs kyi mdog go //
T02TD1511E:322a-30: bum pa bzang po ni gser ro //
T02TD1511E:322a-31: lte ba ljang gu la ze'u 'bru ser po'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-33: de'i sa ni dmar po shas che ba'i dkar po'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-36: sa gzhi ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-37: 'od zer gyi me ri ni rgyal ba lnga'i mdog go //
T02TD1511E:322a-38: dkyil du sna tshogs padmar nyi ma la rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-39: phyogs kyi 'dang ma rnams la gri gug go //
T02TD1511E:322a-40: mtshams kyi rnams la padma'i snod rnams so //
T02TD1511E:322a-41: 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la zla ba la gri gug nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD1511E:322a-42: dpa' bo rnams ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir mtshan ma mi bri'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-0: sgo dang mtshams rnams su sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la gri gug @322b brgyad do //
T02TD1511E:322b-1: phyi'i zlum po'i thig gi phyi rol mtshams kyi logs su bum pa brgyad do //
T02TD1511E:322b-2: gar gyi snam bu'i lho sgo'i g-yon du pi wang dang gling bu'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-3: g-yas su rnga zlum dang rdza rnga'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-4: de bzhin du bcu drug gi yang mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-6: sems shes las kyi thig las byung //
T02TD1511E:322b-7: rdul btab rim pas shar ba yi //
T02TD1511E:322b-9: grub ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis med pa'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-10: zhes pa rdul tshon dgye ba'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-11: de nas lhag gnas byas pa'i bum pa rnams g-yon skor du dgod de /
T02TD1511E:322b-12: de la rnam par rgyal pa dkyil 'khor la g-yon skor du bskor te /
T02TD1511E:322b-13: rdul tshon gyi phyi lho sgo'i tshangs thig gi g-yon du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-14: las thams cad pa g-yas su'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-15: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i bum pa rnams rang gi phyogs kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor du dgod do zhes bum pa dgod pa'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi ru shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD1511E:322b-19: sdong po bkod pa rnams 'don du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:322b-22: du ru ka la sogs pa'i spos phor brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-23: ras sna tshogs pa stong la sogs pa'am /
T02TD1511E:322b-26: ba dan la sogs pa h'um dang bdag po'i sngags kyis bzlas pa /
T02TD1511E:322b-27: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya bas phul nas /
T02TD1511E:322b-28: sgo kun la ras bzang po dang /
T02TD1511E:322b-30: rnga yab rnams btags te bum pa gang ba yang gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-31: khrus byas te dri bzangs byugs la stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD1511E:322b-32: dbu rgyan dang bcas pas las thams cad pas bsngags pa'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi logs su bsangs la yig gsum dang las thams cad pas bsrungs la rdo rje dang dril bu bzung ste /
T02TD1511E:322b-33: lho sgo ru ni rgyu byed ces //
T02TD1511E:322b-34: bden pa smra bas gang gsungs ba ;
T02TD1511E:322b-35: / kun rdzob don du shes bya ste //
T02TD1511E:322b-36: bri ba'i dkyil 'khor rtogs pa la'o //
T02TD1511E:322b-37: phyogs kyi rnam dbyer mtha' yas pas //
T02TD1511E:322b-38: lho la sogs pa'i rtog pa med //
T02TD1511E:322b-39: de phyir gang du phyogs pa nyid //
T02TD1511E:322b-40: lhor ni rnal 'byor kun gyis dgongs //
T02TD1511E:322b-41: thog mar grub pa'i 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1511E:323a-0: @323a * // dpa' bo drug gi lha rnams dgod //
T02TD1511E:323a-1: sngags kyi go cha cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1511E:323a-2: de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1511E:323a-3: mar me brgyad ni dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:323a-4: mar khu chen po'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1511E:323a-5: me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram //
T02TD1511E:323a-6: sna tshogs dri yis legs par bsgos //
T02TD1511E:323a-7: grub pa'i dam tshig 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1511E:323a-8: ye shes 'khor lo dang ldan pa //
T02TD1511E:323a-9: sems kyis yang dag la sbyar nas //
T02TD1511E:323a-10: lta ba gyen du rgyu ba yis //
T02TD1511E:323a-11: sngar gyi spyan 'dren phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1511E:323a-12: phem yig sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1511E:323a-13: yul ni mtha' yas na gnas pa'i //
T02TD1511E:323a-14: dgyes shid grub sbyin lha mo rnams //
T02TD1511E:323a-15: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug bcas //
T02TD1511E:323a-16: sngar gyi phyag mtshan sogs kyis brgyan //
T02TD1511E:323a-17: 'jig rten mgon po thugs rje ldan //
T02TD1511E:323a-18: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byon par 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:323a-19: gnyis su med pa'i snyoms 'jug pas //
T02TD1511E:323a-20: he ru ka gnas dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1511E:323a-21: nyams dga' byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas //
T02TD1511E:323a-22: mdzad par 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02TD1511E:323a-23: ces gsungs pas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi bdag nyid kho nas skad cig gis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor stong par bsams la /
T02TD1511E:323a-24: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bltas nas bsgrub pa'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'am /
T02TD1511E:323a-25: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pas yang dag par bskyod pa'i dga' ba'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la /
T02TD1511E:323a-26: zhabs bsil dang mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1511E:323a-27: rang gi nang du bcug pas 'dod chags chen pos zhu par gyur te rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste padma nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid spros te //
T02TD1511E:323a-28: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gnas ji lta bar bzhugs par bsams nas /
T02TD1511E:323a-29: mig dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i de ma thag tu rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur nas ji ltar rigs par rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:323a-30: de nas lha mo rnams spros pa'i yid kyis mchod pas mchod de bkra shis kyi ras zung dang /
T02TD1511E:323b-4: pi wang ma la sogs pas mchod la /
T02TD1511E:323b-5: dril bu dkrol zhing bstod la rang dang shes rab ma'i phyang chub kyi sems padma'i snod du bcug la bdud rtsir byas pa drangs te myangs pas tshim par byas pa lhag par mos te bdag po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
T02TD1511E:323b-6: dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas a'a li dang k'a li dang yi ge brgya pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:323b-7: rang gi gtor ma phul nas phyi rol du phyogs kyi gtor ma gzhan la yang dbul du bcug ste /
T02TD1511E:323b-8: sumbha la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas shing g-yon skor du bskor ba gsum bya'o //
T02TD1511E:323b-9: dkyil 'khor la sogs rtsom pa'i tshe //
T02TD1511E:323b-10: gal te rlung sogs skyes na ni //
T02TD1511E:323b-11: he ru ka dpal bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1511E:323b-12: gdug pa thams cad bzlog par bya //
T02TD1511E:323b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi rol du phyogs skyong rnams la rang rang gi mdog pa dan dbul lo zhes pa dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1511E:323b-14: thab khung khru gang tsam yin te //
T02TD1511E:323b-15: mdzes shing thod pa'i rnam pa can //
T02TD1511E:323b-16: de 'dra'i stegs bus bskor ba grub //
T02TD1511E:323b-17: lho ru bltas pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1511E:323b-18: ri bo'i steng du gnas pa yi //
T02TD1511E:323b-20: 'dab mar dgra sta zhags pa dang //
T02TD1511E:323b-21: rtse gsum pa dang kha tv'am ga / lte ba ru ni rdo rje dgod //
T02TD1511E:323b-22: khro bo'i rnam pa 'jigs su rung //
T02TD1511E:323b-23: phyi ru rdo rje'i phreng ba bya //
T02TD1511E:323b-24: stegs bu padma'i rnam pa can //
T02TD1511E:323b-25: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dgang gzar dang //
T02TD1511E:323b-26: blugs gzar yang ni de bzhin te //
T02TD1511E:323b-27: 'on kyang kha ni thod pa ltar //
T02TD1511E:323b-28: dkyil du khro bo'i rdo rje brko //
T02TD1511E:323b-29: a'a li k'a li yang dag brjod //
T02TD1511E:323b-30: ji snyed mar sogs sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1511E:323b-31: g-yon du sreg rdzas la sogs gzhag / g-yon gyi spyod pas bsreg par bya //
T02TD1511E:323b-32: gnyis med la sogs sngags chen gyis //
T02TD1511E:323b-33: mchod par bya ste cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1511E:323b-34: me nang he ru ka sogs la //
T02TD1511E:323b-35: sbyin sreg byas nas yon blang bya //
T02TD1511E:323b-36: mi dang ba glang khyi dang ni //
T02TD1511E:323b-37: ce sbyang rta dang glang chen gyi //
T02TD1511E:323b-38: sha yis grub par 'dod pa pos //
T02TD1511E:323b-39: rnal 'byor shes pas sbyin par bya //
T02TD1511E:323b-40: skra grol gcer bu gsang nas su //
T02TD1511E:323b-41: ts'a ru'i bza' ba sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD1511E:324a-0: @324a * // dpal ldan bde mchog rnal 'byor che //
T02TD1511E:324a-1: sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya //
T02TD1511E:324a-2: de la thab ni cha gsum byas la cha gnyis brkos te /
T02TD1511E:324a-3: brgyad cha mchu dang mchu'i phyed mu khyud de phyi dang nang du'o //
T02TD1511E:324a-4: de'i phyir stegs pu mchu'i tshad do //
T02TD1511E:324a-5: yi ge gsum zhu ba'i ram las skyes pa'i me lha dmar po dbyu gu dang spyi blugs g-yon na ste /
T02TD1511E:324a-6: g-yas na bgrang phreng dang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1511E:324a-7: ral pa can lto ba 'phyang ba rgyan kun dang ldan pa aom badzra h'um gi yi ges thab khung gi me mtshams su bzhugs la dam tshig sems dpa' la ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas thab tu /
T02TD1511E:324a-8: aom aa gna ye ma h'a te dza de ba ri shi dvi dza satva ma gri hi tv'a hu ti ma h'a ra aa smin sanni hi to bha wa zhes pas spyan drangs te /
T02TD1511E:324a-9: dza: bh'um bam ho: zhes pas dgug pa dang /
T02TD1511E:324a-11: tha mi dad pa dang mnyes par byas la /
T02TD1511E:324a-12: aargha la sogs pas mchod de lag pa g-yon pa kha gyen du byas te byang chub mchog gi khu tshur gyis mar gyis gang ba'i dgang gzar bzung la /
T02TD1511E:324a-13: de'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa yang kha gyen du blta bas mar gyis gar ba'i blugs gzar bzung nas dgang gzar blugs gzar gyi steng du rang gi yi dam gyi sa bon yi ge gsum dang spel ba 'od zer dang ldan par bsams la me'i zhal du yi ge rom bltas te /
T02TD1511E:324a-14: bus mo gnyis kyi bar du gru mo gnyis bzhag la dgang gzar gyi kha'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa kha thur du bltas pas blugs gzar kha thur du byas la /
T02TD1511E:324a-15: dgang gzar g-yas skor du lan gsum bskor bas me lha'i zhal cung zad gdangs pa la lag pa'i sreg blugs gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig / aom aagna ye a'a di bya a'a bi sha a'a bi sha / ma h'a shri ye ha bya ka bya b'a ha na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324a-16: aom na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02TD1511E:324a-17: che ge mo'i sh'intam ku ru /
T02TD1511E:324a-18: yang na aom aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324a-20: aom badzra aa na la ma h'a bh'u ta dz'a la ya sarbam smim ku ru sarba dusht'a na h'um phat dri shya dza:h'um bam ho:sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho //
T02TD1511E:324a-21: zhes dam tshig kyang lan gsum du snyan du gsol lo //
T02TD1511E:324a-22: mar gyi sbyin sreg gzhan gyi sngags ni //
T02TD1511E:324b-0: de nas me'i @324b mtshan ma blta ste /
T02TD1511E:324b-1: rtse mo gcig pa phun sum tshogs pa ster ro //
T02TD1511E:324b-2: rtse mo gnyis pa g-yo ba med par ro //
T02TD1511E:324b-3: rtse mo bzhi pa mnyam pa yin na rgyas pa dang dngos grub ster ro //
T02TD1511E:324b-4: dkar zhing snum par du ba med cing dri ma med pa'i mes ni nad med pa dang rigs 'phel lo //
T02TD1511E:324b-5: dmar po dang ser pos ni rgyal srid ster ro //
T02TD1511E:324b-6: me tog tsam pa ka dang /
T02TD1511E:324b-9: ma la ti'i dri dang ldan pa bsil ba dri bzangs ni dge pa'o //
T02TD1511E:324b-10: pi wang la sogs pa dang zangs dung gi sgra zab mo can ni mthong ba'i chos la bde ba ster ro //
T02TD1511E:324b-13: rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can ni sgra med pa dang g-yas skor ba dang gong bu gcig pas ni don chen po ster ro //
T02TD1511E:324b-14: 'bar ba rtse gsum pa 'phro ba dang bcas pa g-yo zhing g-yon du phyogs na nad med do //
T02TD1511E:324b-15: lan gsum mam bdun dgad blugs dang /
T02TD1511E:324b-18: ras dang bstod pas mchod nas /
T02TD1511E:324b-19: aom bo dhi briksha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-21: aom badzra la t'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-23: aom badzra yadzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-25: aom badzra ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-26: 'o ma can gyi shing rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1511E:324b-27: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-29: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-31: aom sarba sam pa de sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-33: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-35: aom badzra aa pri ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:324b-37: de nas me lha'i thugs kar padma'i gdan du sa bon dang phyag mtshan yongs su gyur ba las bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ye shes kyi 'khor lo bcug ste /
T02TD1511E:324b-38: bsad gtor la sogs pa dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de de'i rang gi 'dod lha'i sa bon bzlas pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1511E:324b-39: lha re re la yang ngo //
T02TD1511E:324b-40: de la zhu ba ni me lha'i kha la'o //
T02TD1511E:324b-41: yam shing dang ku sha la sogs pa 'ong la'o //
T02TD1511E:324b-42: zan dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phyag tu'o //
T02TD1511E:325a-1: mdun du zhi ba'i sems kyis ji ltar nus pa dbul lo //
T02TD1511E:325a-2: rgyas pa la ni rgyas pa'i sems kyis so //
T02TD1511E:325a-3: zhes pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1511E:325a-4: tha mar ni 'dod pa'i don zhus la bzod par gsol te rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1511E:325a-5: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat ces pa dang /
T02TD1511E:325a-6: aom yig gis lan bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kar g-yas g-yon gyi khu tshur gyis bzung la re res lan gnyis gnyis g-yon skor du /
T02TD1511E:325a-7: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a satv'a sya sarba p'a pam da ha na sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:325a-8: zhes pas byur bsal nas yungs kar de mer dor ro //
T02TD1511E:325a-9: de bzhin du g-yas skor dang gnyi ga g-yon skor gyis so //
T02TD1511E:325a-10: de bzhin du aom sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ni badzr'a ya badzr'a satva sya sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:325a-12: kham por dkar pos byugs pa dang /
T02TD1511E:325a-13: d'ur ba'i myu gu dang bcas pa'i lci ba'i chad bu rnams dang /
T02TD1511E:325a-14: mar me'i sdong bu dang bcas pa'i zan gyi chang bu rnams kyis so //
T02TD1511E:325a-15: ras kyis byur bsal ba yang ngo //
T02TD1511E:325a-16: 'on kyang rdza phor la sogs pa ni me la mi dor ro //
T02TD1511E:325a-17: lag pa dag gis nye reg bya'o //
T02TD1511E:325a-18: dri la sogs pa sngon du 'gro zhing las thams cad pa dang h'um yig lan bdun bzlas pa'i mar dang bcas pa'i spos dkar gyis bdug par bya'o zhes pa /
T02TD1511E:325a-19: rab gnas la sogs pa kun la byur bsal ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1511E:325a-20: dang por snying po 'bum bzlas na //
T02TD1511E:325a-21: he ru ka yi bka' thob nas //
T02TD1511E:325a-22: dbang bskur sbyin pa la sogs bya //
T02TD1511E:325a-23: gzhan du bzhad gad thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:325a-24: nus pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1511E:325a-25: snying ga'i sa bon dmar 'od kyis //
T02TD1511E:325a-26: slob ma'i lus la yang dag dgang //
