T02TD1511E:325a-27: dbang bskur sbyin pa yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1511E:325a-28: sngags pas rnal 'byor ma dang bcas //
T02TD1511E:325a-29: dkyil 'khor lho ru gnas pa yi //
T02TD1511E:325a-30: slob ma lho ru kha bltas la //
T02TD1511E:325a-31: mkhas pas 'di skad brjod par bya //
T02TD1511E:325a-32: bu rnams nges par gnas pa yis //
T02TD1511E:325a-33: sdom pa'i mchog ni bsrung bar mdzod //
T02TD1511E:325a-34: sdom pa'i dbang las lhag pa med //
T02TD1511E:325a-35: lhan skyes thabs kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1511E:325b-0: de dag gis mandala byas te pus mo sa la btsugs te snyim pa sbyar ba me tog dang bcas pa rnams @325b rang gi kha nas lus la bcug ste rdo rje'i lam nas shes rab kyi padma la gnas pa rnams la /
T02TD1511E:325b-1: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i shes rab ma dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kha nas zhugs te zhu bar gyur pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsgoms nas bton te lho'i sgor gnas pa rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs su gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:325b-2: bdag gi ston pa dpa' bo che //
T02TD1511E:325b-3: rnal 'byor ma mchog kha sbyor la //
T02TD1511E:325b-4: byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa //
T02TD1511E:325b-5: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1511E:325b-6: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD1511E:325b-7: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol//
T02TD1511E:325b-8: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug rnams //
T02TD1511E:325b-9: phag mo dang ni he ru ka'i //
T02TD1511E:325b-10: gsang ba'i gnas sogs yang dag dgang //
T02TD1511E:325b-11: lus la yang dag gnas par gsungs //
T02TD1511E:325b-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1511E:325b-13: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1511E:325b-14: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD1511E:325b-15: mgon po bdag ni gzhug par mdzod //
T02TD1511E:325b-17: bu tshur shog cig tshul chen gyi //
T02TD1511E:325b-18: snod ni khyod yin theg chen pa'i //
T02TD1511E:325b-19: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02TD1511E:325b-20: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD1511E:325b-21: dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba yi //
T02TD1511E:325b-22: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD1511E:325b-23: rdo rje sngags kyi mthu yis ni //
T02TD1511E:325b-24: ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes //
T02TD1511E:325b-25: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD1511E:325b-26: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / bla ma mchog dang de bzhin byams //
T02TD1511E:325b-27: sangs rgyas la gus skye bo dga' //
T02TD1511E:325b-28: rtsa ba'i ltung ba yongs spangs shing //
T02TD1511E:325b-29: sbom po'i ltung ba spang bar bya //
T02TD1511E:325b-30: sems can rnams ni mnyes par bya //
T02TD1511E:325b-31: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02TD1511E:325b-32: zhes yang dag par len du bcug la /
T02TD1511E:325b-33: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1511E:325b-34: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD1511E:325b-35: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02TD1511E:325b-36: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung //
T02TD1511E:325b-37: zhes lan gsum 'don du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:325b-38: de ltar thun mong gi sdom pa can gyi slob dpon gyi sdom pa 'dod na /
T02TD1511E:325b-39: phyir mo ldog pa 'khor lo'i dbang //
T02TD1511E:325b-40: zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba 'debs su bcug la /
T02TD1511E:326a-1: sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes pa la sogs pa lan gsum 'don du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:326a-2: de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas da rnams kyi snying ga dang /
T02TD1511E:326a-3: mgo bo rnams su rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo'i steng du h'um nag po dang /
T02TD1511E:326a-5: aom dkar po rnams bsams nas brjod cing dri'i chu dang bcas pa'i rdo rje g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis de'i gnas gsum du reg nas mgo bo la me tog dang /
T02TD1511E:326a-7: mar me dang snying gar dri byin nas byang chub shing la sogs pa'i shing sor bcu gnyis pa drang zhing srog chags med pa ma gas pa rma med pa /
T02TD1511E:326a-8: dri bzang po'i chus bkrus pa rtse mo la me tog bcings pa /
T02TD1511E:326a-9: kha byang du phyogs pas slob ma rnams la sbyin no //
T02TD1511E:326a-10: de rnams kyis kyang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa pa'i lci bas byugs par byang dam shar du phyogs pas so //
T02TD1511E:326a-11: shing de aom badzra h'a sa ham zhes brjod cing rtse mo 'chos te gyen du blta zhing mdun du dor ro //
T02TD1511E:326a-12: de'i rtse mo ltung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD1511E:326a-13: shar ram byang ngam nub bam lho'am steng dam 'og tu bltas te byung na zhi ba'am rgyas pa'am dbang ngam mngon spyod dam rig pa 'dzin pa'am sa 'og gi dngos grub rnams go rims bzhin du brjod do //
T02TD1511E:326a-14: phyi rol du ltung na dngos grub med do //
T02TD1511E:326a-15: de nas pa las skyes shing pom bzlas pa'i chu kha bshal ba'i phyir byin nas /
T02TD1511E:326a-16: las thams cad pa lan bdun bzlas pa'i dri'i chu khyor gsum /
T02TD1511E:326a-17: aom hr'i: bi shuddha dharm'a:sarba p'a pa ni shtsa sya bi sho dha ya sarba bi ka la pan aa pa na ya h'um /
T02TD1511E:326a-18: zhes brjod cing 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:326a-19: phyi rol du 'dug tu bcug la h'um las byung ba las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i ku sha ma nyams pa bting nas nyal ba'i don du dang /
T02TD1511E:326a-20: dhi yig las skyes pa gcig sdas kyi don du /
T02TD1511E:326a-21: aom badzra t'ikshna bam zhes pas sbyin no //
T02TD1511E:326a-22: skud pa dmar po slob ma'i lus kyi tshad tsam pa sum lta ba tu byas te h'um yig dang las thams cad pa lan bdun du bzlas la mdud pa gsum du byas te slob ma rnams kyi dpung pa g-yon par aom buddha mee tri raksha sarb'a na sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:326b-0: zhes pas @326b bcings te yang dag par bsrungs la spro ba bskyed de /
T02TD1511E:326b-1: spyod mchog 'di la gang rnams kyi //
T02TD1511E:326b-2: blo gros shin tu dri ma med //
T02TD1511E:326b-3: de rnams ngan song sdug bsngal kun //
T02TD1511E:326b-4: rab tu 'byung ba yang dag zhi //
T02TD1511E:326b-6: bzlas pa'i don du las kun gyi sngags byin te bsrungs la snga dro rmi lam bdag la smros shig byas la seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis nyal du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:326b-7: rang yang de bzlas pa ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD1511E:326b-8: snga dro gtor ma phul te dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa las byung ste slob ma rnams ma rmi lam dris nas ri las ltung ba la sogs pa mi dge ba'i rmi lam yin na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs la /
T02TD1511E:326b-9: dkyil 'khor khang par 'jug pa'i tshe slob dpon rnams kyis aom pra bi sha bha ga w'a na ma h'a su kha moksha au ram sarba siddhi su kha pra tam pa ra ma su kha autta ma siddhya rtham dza:h'um bam ho:pra siddhya sva zhes pas gzengs bstod la bzhugs /
T02TD1511E:326b-10: g-yas su bskor zhing 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi skus byang la sogs pa'i sgor gnas nas /
T02TD1511E:326b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi lho la sogs pa'i sgo //
T02TD1511E:326b-12: aom badzra audgha t'a ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02TD1511E:326b-14: me tog gi phreng ba aom pa ra ma su kha a'a sha ya su la li ta bi l'a sa na mi trer na m'a mi bha ga w'an tam dza:h'um bam ho:hi hi hi hi h'i:pra t'i tstsha ku su ma aanydza li n'a tha ho zhes pa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du dor nas /
T02TD1511E:326b-15: slar phreng ba'i dbang gi bsam pas rang gi mgo la bcings nas mngon sum du gyur pa'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug bla mar lhag par mos pa des ster bzhin pa'i phreng ba'i dbang la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dbang ma lus pa cho ga ji lta ba dang /
T02TD1511E:326b-16: slob dpon gyis las thams cad la gnang ba thob nas slob ma gzhug pa'i ched du bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid kyi bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub 'dod par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:326b-17: bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang bya ste /
T02TD1511E:326b-18: nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD1511E:326b-19: tho gam tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD1511E:326b-20: mi bskyod rdo rje bdag la gsol //
T02TD1511E:327a-0: dngos grub 'dzin pa kun gyi mchog / dbang @327a * //
T02TD1511E:327a-1: phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1511E:327a-2: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD1511E:327a-3: mi 'gyur mchog kun bdag sgrubs shig / nyes pa med pa rtag pa ste //
T02TD1511E:327a-4: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02TD1511E:327a-5: 'dod chags chen po dga' pa che //
T02TD1511E:327a-6: bcom ldan de nyid bdag sgrubs shig / shin tu dag pa chos kyi mchog //
T02TD1511E:327a-7: gdod nas grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1511E:327a-8: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1511E:327a-9: byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD1511E:327a-10: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya mchog / grub pa'i rdo rje cher bsor ba //
T02TD1511E:327a-11: rdo rje snyems ma bdag po'i bdag / sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD1511E:327a-12: sems can kun gyi yab yin te //
T02TD1511E:327a-13: dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa mchog / shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor 'di //
T02TD1511E:327a-14: bden pa'i byin rlabs gang yin pa //
T02TD1511E:327a-15: bden pa de yis mgon khyod kyis //
T02TD1511E:327a-16: bdag gi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzod //
T02TD1511E:327a-17: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD1511E:327a-18: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02TD1511E:327a-19: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1511E:327a-20: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD1511E:327a-21: de bzhin nyid las yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1511E:327a-22: bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1511E:327a-23: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma rnams //
T02TD1511E:327a-24: kun gyis sdig med mthong bar shog / ces brjod cing nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan ma gang gi yin pa de bzhin no //
T02TD1511E:327a-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1511E:327a-26: 'dod chags kun ni 'dod yon lnga yis sems can mnyes par byed pa'o //
T02TD1511E:327a-27: 'dod chags chen po ni dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'o //
T02TD1511E:327a-28: gdong nas grol ba ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o //
T02TD1511E:327a-29: kun bdag ni chos nyid kyis so //
T02TD1511E:327a-30: byang chub kyi bdag nyid kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02TD1511E:327a-31: 'dod bya yin pas 'dod pa yang yin la mchog kyang ngo zhes slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1511E:327a-33: // / de nas lhag gnas byas pa'i slob ma khrus dang dris byugs la /
T02TD1511E:327a-34: gos gtsang ma can 'khor lo'i bdag po'i tshul du dmigs la /
T02TD1511E:327a-36: zhes pas stod g-yogs byas te /
T02TD1511E:327a-37: aom badzra aushn'i sha h'um phat /
T02TD1511E:327a-38: ces pas gtsug tor byas la /
T02TD1511E:327b-0: @327b las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i ras dmar pos aom tsa kshur bandha ba ra ma na ya h'um /
T02TD1511E:327b-1: zhes pa'i sngags kyis gi ga ras bcings la a'a:kham b'i ra h'um zhes brjod cing me tog phreng ba bzung ba phul ba las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la snying ga dang /
T02TD1511E:327b-4: padma dang 'khor lo la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i steng du h'um nag po dang /
T02TD1511E:327b-7: de'i 'od zer gyis lus 'od gsal bar byas la h'um zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor gyi lho sgor bzhag pa las kyi rdo rjes bzung la dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i phyir dri bar bya ste /
T02TD1511E:327b-8: kye dga' ba 'dod pa khyod su yin //
T02TD1511E:327b-9: zhes gcig gam gnyis sa ma gsum ste bzhi ni lhan cig tu gzhug par mi bya ste dge 'dun tshogs zung yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1511E:327b-11: kye bde chen bdag ni skal pa bzang po'o //
T02TD1511E:327b-13: de nas slob ma la aom sarba yo ga tsitta audp'a da y'a mi zhes brjod du bcug cing sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:327b-14: me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag ste /
T02TD1511E:327b-15: de ring khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyi /
T02TD1511E:327b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen dam pa 'di dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing ma dad par yang mi bya'o zhes bsgo nas /
T02TD1511E:327b-17: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat ces pas bkug ste /
T02TD1511E:327b-18: yol ba'i nang du shr'i he ru ka ya bde ma he bidy'a r'a dza ya dh'i:ma h'a sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:327b-19: zhes pa g'a yi tri 'don du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:327b-22: bde ba mchog gi pho brang du //
T02TD1511E:327b-23: bu khyod bdag gis drangs pa'o //
T02TD1511E:327b-24: zhes bsgo nas lho sgo ru aom na ma:ste h'um /
T02TD1511E:327b-25: na ma:mi h'um na mo na ma:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:327b-27: mkha' spyod la sogs dbye ba yis //
T02TD1511E:327b-28: phyag gsum byed du gzhug par bya //
T02TD1511E:327b-29: thal mo spyi por bzhag nas su //
T02TD1511E:327b-30: yan lag kun gyis phyag bya'o //
T02TD1511E:327b-31: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i bhya:p'u dzo pa sth'a n'a ya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1511E:327b-32: sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi ni /
T02TD1511E:327b-33: d'a ki nya rya ae dhi tishthantu m'am /
T02TD1511E:327b-34: g-yon du snying gar thal mo sbyar te gzung po //
T02TD1511E:328a-0: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i bhya:p'u dz'a bhi she k'a ya a'atma @328a * //
T02TD1511E:328a-1: n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1511E:328a-2: sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi ni l'a m'a dy'a bhi shinytsa tu m'am /
T02TD1511E:328a-3: g-yon pa'i thal mo dpral bar byas te byang du'o //
T02TD1511E:328a-4: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i bhya:p'u dz'a pra brta na ya a'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1511E:328a-5: sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi nya khanda ro d'a ry'a pra brta ya ntu m'am /
T02TD1511E:328a-6: spyi gtsug tu thal mo sbyar te nub tu'o //
T02TD1511E:328a-7: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i bhya:p'u dz'a karma ne a'atna n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1511E:328a-8: sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi ni r'u pi ni ry'a ya karma ka yantu ;
T02TD1511E:328a-11: aom gu ru tsa ra na au pa stha n'a ya a'atma n'i ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1511E:328a-12: aom sarba tva pa ri tra na ya a'atma n'a ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1511E:328a-13: zhes don dang ldan pa 'don du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:328a-14: de nas lho sgor lhor kha bltas te /
T02TD1511E:328a-15: kye bu khyod kyang rab tu gnas //
T02TD1511E:328a-16: de nyid snang ba'i rigs la ni //
T02TD1511E:328a-17: dpa' bo lha mo rnams skye ba'i //
T02TD1511E:328a-18: he ru ka yi rnam pas mdzes //
T02TD1511E:328a-19: skyes bu gang zhig skyes nas su //
T02TD1511E:328a-21: ye shes sdom pa'i dag pa ste //
T02TD1511E:328a-22: bdag gis khyed la sbyin pa yin //
T02TD1511E:328a-23: dkyil 'khor ma mthong mi rnams la //
T02TD1511E:328a-24: khyod kyis kyang ni smra mi bya //
T02TD1511E:328a-25: gal te smra na de'i tshe bu //
T02TD1511E:328a-26: dam tshig nyams par byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:328a-27: mgo bor rdo rje bzhag ste dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02TD1511E:328a-28: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te tshul 'di 'ga' zhig la smras na 'dis khyod kyi mgo 'gas par byed do zhes nyan du bcug la snying gar rdo rje bzung la /
T02TD1511E:328a-29: de ring phag mo rang nyid dpal //
T02TD1511E:328a-30: khyod kyi snying gar yang dag gnas //
T02TD1511E:328a-31: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD1511E:328a-32: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD1511E:328a-34: ming med dang mthe bos bzung ba'i dung gi chus ma na'i tshul du /
T02TD1511E:328a-35: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1511E:328a-36: de tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD1511E:328a-37: de tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD1511E:328a-38: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung cig / aom panytsa aa mri ta au da ka tha tha h'um zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags kyis bdud rtsi lnga 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:328a-39: de ring nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal rdo rje phag mo nga yin gyis ngas gang bsgom de 'bad par gyis shig / khyod kyis nga la smad par yang mi bya ste /
T02TD1511E:328b-0: kha na ba ma thob ma spangs par tshe dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur @328b ta re zhes brjod do //
T02TD1511E:328b-1: de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor la phyogs pa la khyod kyi mig la ci lta bu'i snang ba mthong zhes dris nas /
T02TD1511E:328b-6: nag po snang ba rnams kyis go rim sa bzhin du zhi ba dang /
T02TD1511E:328b-9: mngon spyod kyi skal pa dang ldan par shes par byas nas /
T02TD1511E:328b-10: de mthe bong gnyis nas g-yon pas bzung nas rdo rje'i 'gros kyis las thams cad bzlas shing g-yon skor du bskor ba gsum byed du bcug nas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bya'o /
T02TD1511E:328b-13: slob ma 'di ni yang dag gzhug / lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa ni //
T02TD1511E:328b-14: bsod nams ji ltar 'di la shog / ces pas slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1511E:328b-16: // / sngar bzung ba'i phreng ba yi ge h'um gis bsngags pa las ma rnyings shing yang ba'i me tog cing blangs te de'i lag pa thal mo sbyar bar sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:328b-17: de'i tshe de nyid kyang yi ge gsum gyis 'od gsal zhing sdig pa bkrus par mos nas bla mas de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas gus pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug mdun na gnas pa bzhin du dmigs nas dkyil 'khor der yid kyis zhugs te /
T02TD1511E:328b-18: aom tashthi badzra dri dho me bha wa sh'a shva to me bha ba hri da yam me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho /
T02TD1511E:328b-19: a'a:kham b'i ra h'um pra t'i tstsha ku su ma aanytsa li n'a tha ho:/
T02TD1511E:328b-20: zhes brjod cing mig la sogs pa bsdams nas de'i dbu la me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:328b-21: re kh'a lnga'i nang du me tog lhung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rigs bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:328b-23: mdzod spu'am dbu'am gtsug tor la lhung na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
T02TD1511E:328b-24: spyan nam zhal la ni sngags kyi dngos grub po //
T02TD1511E:328b-26: lha rnams las ring na yun ring pos so //
T02TD1511E:328b-27: me tog de aom pra ti grihna tam ai mam satva ma h'a ba la /
T02TD1511E:328b-28: zhes pas mgo la bcing ngo zhes pa phreng ba'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1511E:328b-29: slob ma'i snying gar zla ba la bdag po dang /
T02TD1511E:329a-1: gnyis la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom gnyis bsgoms nas /
T02TD1511E:329a-2: dpal ldan phag mo rang nyid kyis //
T02TD1511E:329a-3: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
T02TD1511E:329a-4: rdo rje mig ni bla med pa //
T02TD1511E:329a-5: kun du gzigs pas 'byed par mdzod //
T02TD1511E:329a-6: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:329a-7: aom dzny'a na tsakshu h'um a'a:sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:329a-8: zhes brjod cing gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:329a-9: da ni dad pa'i shugs kyis ni //
T02TD1511E:329a-11: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes //
T02TD1511E:329a-12: phyag rgya sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1511E:329a-13: yon phul te phyag byas nas gcig pur 'dug pa'i slob mas bla ma la gsol ba gdab ste /
T02TD1511E:329a-14: bsam du med pa'i chos kyi snod //
T02TD1511E:329a-15: dbang bskur ba ni bdag mdzod cig / bla ma yis ni lho sgo ru //
T02TD1511E:329a-16: he ru ka yi bdag nyid sems /
T02TD1511E:329a-17: seng ge'i gdan la gzhag pa'am //
T02TD1511E:329a-18: sna tshogs padma'i shing ste gsal //
T02TD1511E:329a-19: phyag rgya lnga ldan slob ma de //
T02TD1511E:329a-20: kha tv'am ga ni thogs gnas la //
T02TD1511E:329a-21: steng du lha mos gdugs bzung pa //
T02TD1511E:329a-22: g-yas pa da ma ru thogs pa //
T02TD1511E:329a-23: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' tshogs kyis //
T02TD1511E:329a-24: bskor ba'i dkyil du gnas pa ni //
T02TD1511E:329a-25: glu dang bkra shis la sogs pa //
T02TD1511E:329a-26: 'bad pas yang dag mchod nas su //
T02TD1511E:329a-27: sngar bshad rim pas byur bsal bya //
T02TD1511E:329a-28: rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs chu //
T02TD1511E:329a-29: blangs nas thod par byas nas su //
T02TD1511E:329a-30: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang //
T02TD1511E:329a-31: de las byung ba'i mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1511E:329a-32: des mtshan pa'i rang bzhin gyi chu bas mas la snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i ye shes sems dpa' der bcug la /
T02TD1511E:329a-33: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis phyogs mtha' yas pa na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD1511E:329a-34: rig pa'i lha mo rnams yang dag par mchod nas slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i don du /
T02TD1511E:329a-35: rdo rje gyis sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1511E:329a-36: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i ched du dbang //
T02TD1511E:329a-37: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar gsol //
T02TD1511E:329a-38: de ltar 'di la stsal du gsol //
T02TD1511E:329b-0: de dag shes rab ma dang snyoms par zhugs te 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas nang du zhugs nas rdo rje lam nas 'thon te khu ba de lha mo'i padma'i @329b kha nas nang du bcug pa'i slob ma skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes la h'um dang rdo rje las byung ba'i yum dang bcas pa'i mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa la dbang bskur nas /
T02TD1511E:329b-1: yang phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis padma las 'thon te gnas pa'i slob ma la nam mkha' gang bar gnas pa'i yum dang bcas pa'i rdo rje can rnams kyis gur ku ma la sogs pa'i cha dang /
T02TD1511E:329b-2: byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod pa rnams phyag gis cung zad gzhol bas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
T02TD1511E:329b-3: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas bkra shis gang zhig ces pa la sogs pa'i bkra shis brjod cing /
T02TD1511E:329b-4: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD1511E:329b-5: zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1511E:329b-6: aom shr'i tsakra b'i ra tvam aa bhi shanyts'i mi /
T02TD1511E:329b-7: aom badzra au da ka aa bhi shanytsi h'um su ra ta stvam aa h'um zhes pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1511E:329b-8: de de'i tshe bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:329b-10: gsol ba btab pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma aom dang rin po che las skyes pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par bsams nas chu'i dbang las gsungs pa'i snying ga'i 'od zer gyis phyogs mtha' yas pa la sogs 'dir yang shes par bya ste /
T02TD1511E:329b-13: ming gi dbang du yang ngo //
T02TD1511E:329b-14: 'dir khyad par du gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i dbu rgyan cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan las byas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa slob ma'i rigs kyi bdag po dbus na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa de'i mgo la bskon zhing steng du /
T02TD1511E:329b-15: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD1511E:329b-17: aom satva badzri aa bhi shanytsi bhrum /
T02TD1511E:329b-19: aom ratna badzri aa bhi shanytsi tr'am /
T02TD1511E:329b-21: aom dharm'a badzri aa bhi shanytsi hr'i:/
T02TD1511E:329b-23: aom karma badzri aa bhi shanytsi aa:/
T02TD1511E:329b-24: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:329b-25: aom a'a:badzra mu ku ta aa bhi shanytsi h'um su ra ta stvam aa ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD1511E:330a-0: hr'i:yig las skyes shing des mtshan pa'i padma yongs su gyur pa'i snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin rdo rje slob ma yang de @330a * //
T02TD1511E:330a-1: ltar rdzogs pa'i slob ma'i snying ga dang /
T02TD1511E:330a-3: mgo bo rnams su rdo rje rig nas /
T02TD1511E:330a-4: he ru ka dpal dpa' sogs kyis //
T02TD1511E:330a-5: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1511E:330a-6: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1511E:330a-7: rab tu grub phyir rdo rje zung //
T02TD1511E:330a-8: zhes brjod cing snying ga dang lag pa g-yas par sbyin no //
T02TD1511E:330a-10: kham dang ral gri las skyes pa'i don yod grub pa'i ngo bo ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa'i slob ma dang dril bu bsams te /
T02TD1511E:330a-11: de'i lag pa g-yon par dril bu /
T02TD1511E:330a-12: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1511E:330a-13: dril bu dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror ldan //
T02TD1511E:330a-14: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02TD1511E:330a-15: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02TD1511E:330a-17: rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa'i lag pa gnyis 'khyud pa'i stangs byed du bcug la /
T02TD1511E:330a-18: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shanyts'i mi tishtha b'i ra sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de /
T02TD1511E:330a-20: bcom ldan bzung ngo ba dag la ni //
T02TD1511E:330a-21: yang dag nye bar gyur bar mdzod //
T02TD1511E:330a-24: de ltar gsol ba btab par gyur pa /
T02TD1511E:330a-25: aom dang 'khor lo las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin ye shes dang tha mi dad pa spyi bor rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam por 'dzin du bcug la //
T02TD1511E:330a-26: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD1511E:330a-27: aa bhi shanyts'i mi shr'i he ru ka n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD1511E:330a-28: zhe sdang rdo rje khyod ces pa dang /
T02TD1511E:330a-29: gti mug rdo rje khyod ces pa la sogs pa'i me tog lhung ba'i rigs kyi ming dam rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1511E:330a-31: rdor sems rnam rgyal dpe med dang //
T02TD1511E:330a-32: ye shes sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02TD1511E:330a-33: lhan skyes lus med dga' ba dang //
T02TD1511E:330a-34: dang po mchog rdor aa la la //
T02TD1511E:330a-35: mi bskyod bzhad pa 'gyid pa dang //
T02TD1511E:330a-36: rang byung zhe sdang h'um mdzad dang //
T02TD1511E:330a-37: rdo rje rol pa sgeg pa dang //
T02TD1511E:330a-38: dga' pa dgyes pa sems rdo rje //
T02TD1511E:330a-39: rnam snang sku dang sangs rgyas gzugs //
T02TD1511E:330a-40: sgyu ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
T02TD1511E:330a-41: rin chen yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02TD1511E:330a-42: nga rgyal dang ni gzi brjid dang //
T02TD1511E:330b-2: 'dod chags chos dang spyan ras gzigs //
T02TD1511E:330b-3: don yod las dang dam tshig rlung //
T02TD1511E:330b-4: phrag dog reg bya pha rol byin //
T02TD1511E:330b-5: rdo rje dbyings dbang phreng ba ma //
T02TD1511E:330b-6: myong ma shugs ma rnam rol ma //
T02TD1511E:330b-7: bdag med lag ma m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1511E:330b-8: sdang dang dga' ma phreng ma 'od //
T02TD1511E:330b-9: spyan ma dkar mo mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1511E:330b-10: sgeg ma rdo rje gti mug dga' //
T02TD1511E:330b-11: 'bar ma phreng ma nam mkha' dga' //
T02TD1511E:330b-12: do shal rdo rje dbugs 'byin ma //
T02TD1511E:330b-13: gos dkar bzhad ma 'dod chags dga' //
T02TD1511E:330b-14: glu ma 'dod chags ro langs ma //
T02TD1511E:330b-15: rdo rje ngo mtshar brngo ba ma //
T02TD1511E:330b-16: sgrol ma sgyu ma gar dbang phyug / bsgyings ma rdo rje dga' ma'o //
T02TD1511E:330b-18: dbang lnga po 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i gnyen po yin pas rig pa'i dbang ste lus kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1511E:330b-19: 'di dag gis dbang bskur ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud nyan pa dang bshad pa dang /
T02TD1511E:330b-20: sngags bsgrub pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1511E:330b-22: chu ni shin tu rnam dag yin //
T02TD1511E:330b-23: cod pan mnyan pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:330b-24: rdo rje rtag tu so sor rtog / ming gi me long ye shes yin //
T02TD1511E:330b-25: dril bu bya ba nan tan no //
T02TD1511E:330b-27: / rang gi snying po la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD1511E:330b-28: bcom ldan bdag gis sbyin lags kyis //
T02TD1511E:330b-29: 'di la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1511E:330b-30: zhes brjod cing snying gnas kha'i sgo nas byung ste /
T02TD1511E:330b-31: rna ba g-yas pa nas snying gar zhugs pa bsam zhing sngags sbyin te /
T02TD1511E:330b-33: bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis //
T02TD1511E:330b-34: bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1511E:330b-37: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du bsams nas /
T02TD1511E:330b-38: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1511E:330b-39: he ru ka yi phyag na gnas //
T02TD1511E:330b-40: he ru ka dpal brtul bzhugs brtan //
T02TD1511E:330b-41: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung /
T02TD1511E:330b-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya /
T02TD1511E:330b-43: tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra y'a mi hi hi hi hi h'i:/
T02TD1511E:330b-44: zhes brjod cing de nyid kyis gzung du gzhug go zhes pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so //
T02TD1511E:331a-1: mchog gi snying po'i sngags kyis kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u dang padma'i snod rnams la lan gsum du bzlas la /
T02TD1511E:331a-2: he ru ka dpal phyag rgya 'di //
T02TD1511E:331a-3: phyi nang yang dag gnas pa nyid //
T02TD1511E:331a-4: de nas kha tv'am cang te'u snod //
T02TD1511E:331a-5: sbyin pa dpa' pos gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1511E:331a-6: zhes pas 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa spyod pa'i brtul zhugs so //
T02TD1511E:331a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam gyi tshul du byas nas chos gos kyi grva bzung ba'i khu tshur g-yon pa snying gar bzung zhing g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas /
T02TD1511E:331a-8: 'dir bdag 'khor lo gsum dbang phyug / sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dngos //
T02TD1511E:331a-9: he ru ka dpal ming can gyi //
T02TD1511E:331a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod lung bstan //
T02TD1511E:331a-11: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i grub pa ste /
T02TD1511E:331a-12: me tog lhung ba'i rigs kyi ming gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul can slob ma kye che ge mo rdo rje ta th'a ga ta siddhya:sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
T02TD1511E:331a-13: khams gsum gyis ni rgyal po che //
T02TD1511E:331a-14: bdag po dpal ldan yon tan gter //
T02TD1511E:331a-15: bdud kyi sde kun pham byas nas //
T02TD1511E:331a-16: grong khyer mchog tu khyod rab zhugs //
T02TD1511E:331a-17: zhes brjod de lung bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:331a-18: de ltar lung bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te dang par bya'o zhes lung bstan pa'o //
T02TD1511E:331a-19: mtshan ma med pa'i 'gro ba'i don //
T02TD1511E:331a-20: da lta gang gis byed 'gyur pa //
T02TD1511E:331a-21: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che //
T02TD1511E:331a-22: dpa' po chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD1511E:331a-23: zhes pas gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02TD1511E:331a-24: rdo rje dang h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul du bsams la /
T02TD1511E:331a-25: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1511E:331a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02TD1511E:331a-27: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1511E:331a-28: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag bo'i bdag / bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o zhes brjod cing rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02TD1511E:331a-29: 'di des sangs rgyas la sogs pas //
T02TD1511E:331a-31: phyag rgya 'di ni dam tshig brjod //
T02TD1511E:331a-32: yid kyi sku ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1511E:331a-33: gang gi sku ni ma lus brtan //
T02TD1511E:331a-34: des ni phyag rgya rab tu brjod //
T02TD1511E:331b-0: ces pa ste rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya la 'khyud pa nas gnas pa @331b rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul du bsams te chu'i dbang las gsungs pa'i cho gas /
T02TD1511E:331b-1: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD1511E:331b-2: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1511E:331b-3: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02TD1511E:331b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02TD1511E:331b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma shri ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:331b-6: zhes brjod de dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1511E:331b-7: spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsams la gzhan rgyal ba dang lha mo rnams de nyid la ye shes sems dpa'i chul du thim bar byas nas /
T02TD1511E:331b-8: aom su pra ti shthi badzre sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:331b-9: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o des gsungs pa /
T02TD1511E:331b-10: bcu drug bdag nyid shes rab ma //
T02TD1511E:331b-11: lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas ni //
T02TD1511E:331b-12: rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba las //
T02TD1511E:331b-13: slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod //
T02TD1511E:331b-16: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug grong //
T02TD1511E:331b-17: rang bzhin dag pa sangs rgyas bdag / lus kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1511E:331b-18: dri ma med pa bu khyod ltos //
T02TD1511E:331b-19: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin rtsa sum cu rtsa bdun dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'khor lo dpal he ru ka'i yan lag dang nyid lag nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:331b-20: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1511E:331b-21: gser ram dngul gyi snod la bzhag pa'i mar dang sprang gi mig sman gser gyi thur mas slob ma'i mig gnyis la pram bsams te /
T02TD1511E:331b-22: aom badzra ni tra aa pa ha ra ba ta lam hr'i:/
T02TD1511E:331b-23: zhes byug pa ni thur ma'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1511E:331b-24: aa yig gis bsngags pa'i me long slob ma la bstan zhing /
T02TD1511E:331b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar //
T02TD1511E:331b-26: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD1511E:331b-27: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin du //
T02TD1511E:331b-28: kye bu khyod kyi snying la gnas //
T02TD1511E:331b-29: ngo bo med cing gnas med pa'i //
T02TD1511E:331b-30: chos rnams de ltar shes pas su //
T02TD1511E:331b-31: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD1511E:331b-32: ston pa'i thugs las khyod skyes so //
T02TD1511E:331b-33: zhes brjod pa ni me long gi dbang ngo //
T02TD1511E:331b-34: bla ma chen po 'khor lo'i gtso //
T02TD1511E:331b-35: tshogs 'khor byas te mchod nas su //
T02TD1511E:331b-36: de nas de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1511E:331b-37: dpa' bos gsang pa'i don gsol gdab //
T02TD1511E:332a-1: dang skyabs med pa yi skyabs //
T02TD1511E:332a-2: mgon po rgyu med snying rje che //
T02TD1511E:332a-3: mgon pos bdag la bka' drin stsol //
T02TD1511E:332a-4: bde mchog 'khor los bdag la skyobs //
T02TD1511E:332a-5: ji ltar khyod nyid bdag nyid che //
T02TD1511E:332a-6: mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar stsol //
T02TD1511E:332a-8: bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs //
T02TD1511E:332a-9: zhes pas gsol ba btab la //
T02TD1511E:332a-10: lang tshol bab pa dam tshig dang ldan pa gsang dbang gi don du bla ma la phul la /
T02TD1511E:332a-11: bla ma 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor gyis tha mal pa'i bud med kyi gzugs stong pa'i rjes su phag mo'i gzugs su bskyed pa de dang /
T02TD1511E:332a-12: rdo rje dang padma'i 'du bya ba sngon du 'gro bas snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD1511E:332a-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing /
T02TD1511E:332a-14: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa shes rab dang bcas pa /
T02TD1511E:332a-15: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rang la kha nas nang du bcug la 'dod chags chen pos zhu ba aa wa dh'u t'i las 'thon par bsams la rdo rje nor bur lhan skyes brtan par bya ste /
T02TD1511E:332a-16: mthe bo dang ming med dag gis rdo rje nor bu bzung nas padma las phyung ste /
T02TD1511E:332a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa zhu ba rang gi byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad par lhag par mos pa la gsung rdo rje'i tshul gyi slob ma'i kha ru /
T02TD1511E:332a-19: rgyal sras ji ltar dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1511E:332a-20: de bzhin du ni byang chub sems //
T02TD1511E:332a-21: legs par bu khyod dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1511E:332a-23: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags brjod cing sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:332a-24: des kyang de bzhin gshegs la 'dus pa'i blos aa ho ma h'a su kha /
T02TD1511E:332a-25: zhes smra zhing btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:332a-26: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gnyis gsang bas dbang bskur bas na gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1511E:332a-27: byang chub rdo rjes zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma la shes rab ma de /
T02TD1511E:332a-28: 'di ni khyod kyi nyams dga'i gzugs //
T02TD1511E:332a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyis ster byar gsungs //
T02TD1511E:332a-30: 'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1511E:332a-31: bde ba dam pa yang dag myong //
T02TD1511E:332a-32: rdo rje skyil krung gis sems ni //
T02TD1511E:332b-0: nor bu'i @332b nang du gnas blta zhing //
T02TD1511E:332b-1: zhes rab tu bstan nas gtad do //
T02TD1511E:332b-2: 'khor lo ni sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo gsum gyi lha'i tshogs te /
T02TD1511E:332b-3: de'i rim pas sbyor pa ni dgug pa dang /
T02TD1511E:332b-5: rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon par byed pa'o //
T02TD1511E:332b-6: rdo rje skyil krung ni sna bu ga g-yon dang g-yas pa la rgyu ba bkag nas padma'i nang du bltas pa rdo rje nor bu'i nang du gnas pa'i sems ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD1511E:332b-7: shin tu phra bar blta zhing 'od gsal ba'i bde ba myong bar mdzod cig ces pa'o //
T02TD1511E:332b-8: bud med la dbang bskur na nor bu ni padma'i yin te khyad par ro //
T02TD1511E:332b-9: des kyang gur kum la sogs pas dri zhim par byas pa'i chu skyes gos med par slob dpon la ston cing /
T02TD1511E:332b-11: bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02TD1511E:332b-12: 'ga' zhig cho gas bsten par byed //
T02TD1511E:332b-13: de yi mdun na bdag gnas so //
T02TD1511E:332b-14: sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs pa /
T02TD1511E:332b-15: padmar bya ba ji bzhin gyis //
T02TD1511E:332b-16: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni //
T02TD1511E:332b-17: 'di nyid du ni rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1511E:332b-18: bha nydza mo ksha ho: zhes brjod do //
T02TD1511E:332b-19: cho ga ni phag mo'i gzugs su bskyed pa'o //
T02TD1511E:332b-20: mo ksha zhes pa ni spros pa thams cad dang bral pa ste de ston zhes pa'o //
T02TD1511E:332b-21: des kyang sngom pa'i sku dang de phag mor bskyed nas rdo rje h'um las byung ba nag po de nor bur cung zad dmar pa'i by'a las byung ba by'a dkar pos rtse mo byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02TD1511E:332b-22: padma 'dab ma gsum pa aa dmar po las byung ba dy'a dkar po las byung ba'i lte ba rtse mor dya ser bos byin gyis brlabs pa bsams la /
T02TD1511E:332b-23: g-yon ba'i g-yon ngos su gnas pa'i rtsa rtse mor hr'i: dmar po dang ldan pa'i mdzub mo dang lces sid ces bya zhing bskul nas /
T02TD1511E:332b-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bha wa a'atma ko nya ham zhes pa'i sngags bzlas shing /
T02TD1511E:332b-25: nor bu'i rtsa bar sems ni dga' ba tsam skyes te //
T02TD1511E:332b-26: de rjes nor bu'i dkyil du 'dod bya ma lus par ni 'dod //
T02TD1511E:332b-27: de steng rtse mo'i mthar ni zhi ba mi rtog bzhin //
T02TD1511E:332b-28: gang yang lhan cig skyes rigs padmar gnas pa ston //
T02TD1511E:333a-0: zhes dga' ba'i dbye ba rtogs nas rang gis bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis byin @333a * //
T02TD1511E:333a-1: gyis brlabs pa'i lus bla mas kyang rgyal ba dpag tu med pa bcug pa dang ro gcig tu gyur par dga' bar brtsams te /
T02TD1511E:333a-2: de la dga' bral gyi dad po mchog dga'i tha ma de gnyis kyi bar gyi skad cig tu rig ma'i bde ba la ma ltos par ma nyams pa'i bde ba ste //
T02TD1511E:333a-3: gang la thog mtha' bar ma med //
T02TD1511E:333a-4: gzhan yang med cing rang yang med //
T02TD1511E:333a-5: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa med /
T02TD1511E:333a-6: 'di nyid bde ba chen po'i mchog / ces de kho na nyid bsam du med pa shes rab ye shes te g-yo ba med par 'gyur la nus pa ji lta bas bzung zhing nyams su myong bar gnas so //
T02TD1511E:333a-7: yang na btsan thabs kyis dpral bar drang ngo //
T02TD1511E:333a-8: ma nus na dal bus btang nas padma las lces blangs te de kho na nyid du bltas la dam tshig gi byang chub sems btung ngo zhes so //
T02TD1511E:333a-10: zab cing rgya che'i lam la lha mos la /
T02TD1511E:333a-11: tshig nyid kyi ni dbang bskur rin chen sbyin //
T02TD1511E:333a-13: bzhi pa de ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1511E:333a-14: zhes gsungs pas shes rab ye shes de nyid byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu byung ba ni sgom pa rgyas par byed pa ni sgrib pa med pa gnas pa ni de kho na nyid chos thams cad bsam du med pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin bzhi par brjod par bya'o dbang bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1511E:333a-15: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas rang dang slob ma la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod de //
T02TD1511E:333a-16: tshogs 'khor byas nas mtshan mo khyed kyis 'jug pa 'di bya ba 'di lta bu la yang smra par mi bya'o zhes bsgrags la /
T02TD1511E:333a-17: slob ma las yon blang bar bya zhing des kyang bu dang /
T02TD1511E:333a-21: sa gzhi la sogs pa ji ltar nus pa dbul lo //
T02TD1511E:333a-22: bla ma mnyes na dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD1511E:333a-23: gzhan du min zhes thub pas gsungs //
T02TD1511E:333a-25: phyi rol du phyogs kyi gtor ma la sogs pa byas te nang du zhugs la phyag byas la /
T02TD1511E:333a-26: mchod yon la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD1511E:333a-27: de las byung ba'i dge ba bsngos la bskor ba gsum byas te lho sgor yi ge brgya pa brjod la bzod par gsol lo //
T02TD1511E:333a-28: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad//
T02TD1511E:333b-0: @333b ces pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1511E:333b-2: zhes pas ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD1511E:333b-3: dam tshig 'khor lo rang la bcug nas /
T02TD1511E:333b-4: chos thams cad skye ba med par ltag par mos shing dril bu dkrol te /
T02TD1511E:333b-5: lag pa na yod pa'i rdo rjes tshangs thig gi lam nas dkyil gyi bar du dbyi zhing rang gi mgo la rdul tshon cung zad tsam bcug la /
T02TD1511E:333b-6: padma la sogs pa dang sgo dang mtshams rnams dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD1511E:333b-7: zhi ba'i don du 'dod pa rnams la rdul tshon cung zad byin la rdul tshon gzhan ni rnam rgyal gyi bum par blugs la ras kyis brgyan pa dang do lir bzhag la /
T02TD1511E:333b-8: rol mo la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas chu bo'i 'gram du 'dug ste /
T02TD1511E:333b-9: ba'i lci ba dang dri dkar pos mandala la padma'i lte bar bde mchog la snying po'i sngags kyis mchod nas 'dab ma rnams la klu brgyad de /
T02TD1511E:333b-10: de la shar du aom a'a: aa nna t'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:333b-11: lhor aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:333b-12: nub tu aom a'a: taksha k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:333b-13: byang du aom a'a: b'a su k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:333b-14: dbang ldan du aom a'a: ma h'a padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:333b-15: mer aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:333b-16: bden bral du aom a'a: ka rdo ta k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1511E:333b-17: rlung du aom a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sva h'a /
T02TD1511E:333b-18: zhes pa'i sngags rnams kyis me tog dkar po mchod la lag pa g-yon pa gdengs ka'i stangs dang g-yas pa brkyang ste /
T02TD1511E:333b-19: aom aa nanta p'a su ke /
T02TD1511E:333b-20: taksha ka ka rko ta padma ma h'a padma sham kha p'a la ku li ka /
T02TD1511E:333b-24: danda dha ra ma h'a danda dha ra /
T02TD1511E:333b-25: p'a l'a la hu lu ru nanda /
T02TD1511E:333b-26: s'a ga r'a ma h'a s'a ga r'a tapta /
T02TD1511E:333b-37: aom bhaksha bhaksha a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /
T02TD1511E:333b-38: ma h'a n'a ga aa dhi pa ti sarba bhur bhu ba /
T02TD1511E:333b-39: phu phu sv'a h'a zhes brjod nas /
T02TD1511E:333b-40: gzhan rnams la yang 'o ma'i gtor ma rnams phul te /
T02TD1511E:333b-41: klu rnams la rngul tshon gtad la chur dor ro //
T02TD1511E:333b-42: de rnams kyis kyang bkur sti chen pos 'og tu drangs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:334a-0: gang du rdul tshon khyer ba'i bum pa de chus bkang la de @334a * //
T02TD1511E:334a-1: bzhin du khyer te dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa la sogs pa la gtor par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:334a-2: der ba'i lci bas byugs la gzhon nu ma rnams la 'o thug gi ston mo bya'o //
T02TD1511E:334a-3: slob ma dbang bskur ba bzhin du lha'i rab gnas kyang shes par bya'o //
T02TD1511E:334a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje yis ;
T02TD1511E:334a-5: / cho ga sna tshogs las btus nas //
T02TD1511E:334a-7: sems can kun la phan par shog / dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so /
T02TD1511E:334a-9: // / dza ga ta la'i pandi ta chen po bi bh'u ti tsandras thang bi ha rar bsgyur ba'o//
